author: 0x029EE42d381C9809493F34095235843625E46676
clean_body2: this is an addendum to my current role as placemakeri am proposing a fulltime  role at cabin joining zakk and jon in the meta guildthis whole experience has opened my eyes as to how organizations could run in an abundant open autonomous and decentralized world and i want to make a bigger commitment to iti would continue my role as placemaker  and add an additional  days per week of work within the meta guild  placemaker existing   days per week my role as the delegate of the placemaker guild would continue as is meta guild work new   days per week my goal within the meta guild will be making cabin the most effective joyous and rewarding dao in the  ecosystem this includes a the dao attracting retaining and getting the best work out of contributors b the dao setting an example for how a highperforming decentralized organization can function c setting up the organization to best serve our mission of building a decentralized citythe trad analog might be something along the lines of â€œcooâ€what iâ€™d try to tackle this season in the meta  discord structure  norms how do we maintain a joyous and productive discord filled with juicy warm cabin  compensation how do people earn in the dao how do we get more people making a living independently online how do we award outsized contributions how do we evolve the bounty system so that its a fair and consistent way to  prepping for the onslaught what do we do when we have our â€œvitalik wrote about usâ€ moment and people come streaming into the discord what switch do we need to hit to batten the hatches and have this be a positive rather than negative event within the  dao participation dashboard how do we measure whether we are succeeding in being an open welcoming community that people want to be a part of how do we measure the funnel of people coming into the cabin discord as part of this iâ€™d like to build a contributionengagement analytics system ie people analytics iâ€™d like to create systems that hold us accountable toward improving these metrics every  governance thresholds how do we put the appropriate level of governance against any given decision what types of decisions should be snapshot governance proposals what type of decisions should be less severe how can people know the difference to empower them to get the right amount of buyin to move forward  budget process how do we assign budget cabin  usdc to the various guilds or other efforts how do we give community members tools and voice to hold the budget recipients  progressive decentralization how do we progressively empower guilds and subguilds how do we create an ecology of internal cultures at cabin qualifications experience within cabin cabinâ€™s first core contributor and guild delegate created and grew the placemakers guild which is central to cabinâ€™s vision to be an embassy for daos designed the existing bounty system within the daoexperience starting and caretaking decentralized organizations have founded three intentional communities  purchased  leased  rgb radish and duck cloud helped start and grow preservation society  a burning man camp with over  members write supernuclear a blog on how to create and manage intentional communityexperience with the future of cities founding team of culdesac  building the first postcar neighborhood in the us	 drove financing legal structuring and brand for   person groundup development in tempe az advisorconsultant to kift	 created the business model and go to market plan for kifts decentralized city based on camper vans position length i am requesting this as a  position feb    jan   broken up by a  paternity leave uncompensated in the may  september timeframeÂ  note this is not meant to be a precedent on leave others may make different requeststhere will be a daowide review at  months to ensure everyone is satisfied with the arrangement and if there are any adjustments needed at this point the dao could vote to pause the agreement compensationi am requesting  cabin per month direct compensation i would like to take up to  in usdc in addition i am requesting a timelocked token grant of  cabin per monthÂ  hereâ€™s how the timelocked grant would workÂ  the token grant would vest each month  cabin that i continue to be in a fulltime role with cabin this token grant is meant to reflect a role alongside zakk and jon in the meta guild helping to coordinate the activities of the dao as a wholeÂ Â  the tokens would be timelocked and unlock on a rolling basis  years after being issued while they are locked i canâ€™t transfer them or sell them the timelocked incentivizes me to create longterm value in the dao and stay heavily involvedÂ  the meta guild with me recused would decide on behalf of the dao whether i am still sufficiently active to justify vesting the grant each month members of the dao can share concerns privately with any member of the meta guild if they think the grant should not vest based on my contributions

clean_title2: should we adopt the proposed cabin  roadmap
clean_body2: this is a proposal to adopt the cabin  roadmap developed at the recent cabin core contributor retreat as our communitys plan and goals for the next yearour dao is made up of organizational slime molds which operate most effectively with high degrees of autonomy to chart paths towards a shared north star as an artifact of our first retreat this roadmap is a proposal for a shared set of priorities that will help us chart that  year goal build a decentralized city for independent online  year goal build an embassy for   establish embassies and ambassadorships to foster collaboration across the dao ecosystemi double the capacity of our node  embassy  establish playbook for future nodesii recruit and develop operator ambassadors representing over a dozen top daos in the ecosystemiii gather knowledge from the ambassador network and turn it into the  source for dao operator  host conferences retreats and events to bring dao operators together irl at cabin nodesi run at least  retreat programs that accelerate dao core teamsii host and participate in all of the top  dao conferences and camps of the yeariii evolve our residency program to support dao operators and run at least   build products that support the development of the dao ecosystemi develop the hardware and software infrastructure for an nftbased passport systemii launch and grow the top destination for dao content aggregationiii build a decentralized product development engine that enables us to iteratively test dao tooling

clean_title2: should cabin dao join seed club
clean_body2: cabin dao has been offered a spot in seed club  for cohort  seed club is a  week cohort based program that brings together a network of social token  dao and creative economy pioneers and experts to help design launch and grow social token based projects each week we will have access to two  sessions plus coaching workshops and networking aimed at helping you shape and execute our social token project seed club aims to create value beyond the  program through participating and supporting our community they take active roles in governance and endeavor to build a community that supports projects throughout the lifecycle of the project and beyond in exchange for participation in seed club we would contribute  of cabin tokens to the seed club treasury given the existing supply of cabin this would mean transferring  cabin from cabin dao to seed club in exchange for this in addition to program and network support cabin dao will be rewarded with membership   ownership in seed club as well

title: Treasury Diversification Proposal
body: summaryfollowing august resulted million usdc treasury proposing authorizing tokenomics working group take following two actions converting usdc eth investing usdc treasury low risk investment opportunity motivation converting usdc ethdiversifying forefront treasury top priority heading first conservative step direction convert approximately usdc treasury eth timing conversion also somewhat fortuitous eth past days jan treasury ownership eth also provides upside exposure larger value creation investing usdcthe usdc currently sitting treasury unproductive meaning earning yield proposing conservatively investing usdc lowrisk interestbearing investment opportunity one example would depositing usdc aave savings account yielding jan would yield approximately course year success conditionssuccessfully swapping usdc eth investing usdc lowrisk interestbearing investment opportunity specificationtreasury multi sig execute swap investment costsgas associated trades costs minimal voteyes vote yes approve treasury diversification proposalno vote approve treasury diversification proposalvalue culture community
author: 0xF0CAd7C8b383f79A879eB6Df644e336234EBDac8
clean_body2: summaryfollowing on the august   that resulted in  million usdc in the treasury we are proposing authorizing the tokenomics working group to take the following two actions converting  of usdc to eth investing up to  of the usdc in treasury into a low risk investment opportunity motivation converting usdc to ethdiversifying forefrontâ€™s treasury is a top priority heading into  the first conservative step in this direction is to convert  approximately  of the usdc in treasury into eth the timing of the conversion is also somewhat fortuitous as eth is down  over the past  days as of jan   treasury ownership of eth also provides upside exposure to the larger value creation of  investing usdcthe usdc currently sitting in treasury is â€˜unproductiveâ€™ meaning it is not earning any yield we are proposing conservatively investing  of usdc into a lowrisk interestbearing investment opportunity one example would be depositing the usdc into an aave savings account yielding  as of jan   this would yield approximately  over the course of the year success conditionssuccessfully swapping  of usdc to eth and investing  of usdc into a lowrisk interestbearing investment opportunity specificationtreasury multi sig will execute both the swap and investment costsgas associated with trades costs are minimal voteyes  vote yes to approve treasury diversification proposalno  vote no to not approve treasury diversification proposalvalue culture community

title: Forefront Investment Club
body: purposeapprove forefront investment club established syndicate protocol allow members community collectively pool funds invest simple compliant waya forefront investment club would give community contributors ability leverage forefront brand get highly competitive deals access expensive assets individuals generally could reachalthough club would directly return assets back treasury returns would go back investing members tokengating club accrues value back ff token incentivizes forefront community support portfolio companies projects cluboverviewsyndicate protocol provide tooling requisite legal support create onchain investment club known syndicate investment club clubs groups investors individuals pooling funds total invest clubs invest onchain nfts liquid tokens etc offchain startup equity etc assets syndicates tools automatically manage fundraising cap table distributions clubin investment club legal differentiation members managers thus carry fees club appoint manager handle technical aspects club ensure people voting send money etc however investment perspective members hold equal voting weight receive returns proportional amount funds investedclub detailsclub details club open forefront contributors core collaborators month trial period dao may propose open investment club noncontributors eg tokengating club administration launch technical support etc managed forefront stafflegal limitations club cannot hold club cannot members every member club must actively participate investment decisions eg vote investment club cannot receive funds dao treasury club cannot distribute returns back dao treasurybudgetsyndicate protocol currently charge protocol fees however gas costs associated creating onchain investment vehicle gas costs unpredictable decent ballpark funds paid forefront treasury voteyes vote yes approve forefront investment club proposalno vote approve forefront investment club proposalvalue culture community
author: 0xF0CAd7C8b383f79A879eB6Df644e336234EBDac8
clean_body2: purposeapprove a forefront investment club  established through syndicate protocol  to allow members of our community to collectively pool funds and invest in a simple and compliant waya forefront investment club would give community contributors the ability to leverage the forefront brand to get into highly competitive  deals or access expensive assets that individuals generally could not reachalthough the club would not directly return assets back to the treasury all returns would go back to investing members tokengating the club accrues value back to the ff token and incentivizes the forefront community to support any portfolio companies and projects of the cluboverviewsyndicate protocol will provide the tooling and requisite legal support to create an onchain investment club known as a syndicate investment club clubs are groups of investors no more than  individuals pooling their own funds no more than  total to invest clubs can invest in both onchain nfts liquid tokens etc and offchain startup equity etc assets and syndicates tools will automatically manage fundraising cap table and distributions for the clubin an investment club there is no legal differentiation between members and managers  thus there is no carry or fees the club will appoint a manager to handle the technical aspects of the club ensure people are voting and send money etc however from an investment perspective all members hold equal voting weight and receive returns proportional to the amount of funds investedclub detailsclub details   the club will be open to forefront contributors and core collaborators   after a  month trial period the dao may propose to open up the investment club to noncontributors eg tokengating   club administration launch technical support etc will be managed by the forefront stafflegal limitations   the club cannot hold more than    the club cannot have more than  members   every member of the club must actively participate in investment decisions eg vote on each investment   the club cannot receive funds from the dao treasury   the club cannot distribute returns back to the dao treasurybudgetsyndicate protocol currently does not charge protocol fees however there are gas costs associated with creating an onchain investment vehicle while the gas costs are unpredictable  is a decent ballpark these funds will be paid out of the forefront treasury voteyes  vote yes to approve forefront investment club proposalno  vote no to not approve forefront investment club proposalvalue culture community

title: Forefront Public Goods Funding
body: summarythis proposal requesting usdc forefront treasury gitcoinpowered public goods initiative donated matching funds gitcoin grants round advocacy round focuses helping fund advocacy organizations like fight future sit intersection tech crypto activismthe remaining used matching funds forefront sideround opportunity forefront fund key partners organizations individuals within communitymotivationfrom public goods create universally better outcomes society trapped poverty public goods particularly essential helping people meet basic needs public libraries example assuming else equal help educate population indiscriminately assumes library offers truly equal opportunities learn check resources neededpublic goods also serve privilege power equally poverty often dont notice majority value consume world public goods value lambo sky fire funding public goods ensuring exist accessible often paramount societys advancementforefront dao heavily dependent public goods open source software policy research organizations pushing forward thinking fighting core principles outside practical case though funding public goods morally good port entry responsibility create promote culture want see throughout space fund public goods right thing promote culture encourages moral case rather practical oneat time gitcoins focus quadratic funding exciting opportunity forefront begin funding projects within ecosystem accelerate progress dao social token space growing rapidly forefront opportunity establish critical pillar ecosystemdetails advocacy roundthe gitcoin advocacy round handled entirely gitcoin role funding promoting roundforefront matching partner details gitcoin grants quadratic funding matching funds please extremely important understand gitcoin works forefronts role forefront sideroundin addition gitcoin advocacy round gitcoin support forefronts sideround opportunity forefront community select support key projects partners stakeholders within ecosystem sideround also use quadratic funding matching funds please read article linked claritywe propose forefront dao appoints sideround committee coordinate logistics sideround select projects included fundingthe committee include one forefront staff member one culture guild member one growth guild member one writers guild membereach guild responsible appointing representative author: 0xF0CAd7C8b383f79A879eB6Df644e336234EBDac8
clean_body2: summarythis proposal is requesting  usdc from the forefront treasury for a gitcoinpowered public goods initiative of this   will be donated as matching funds to the gitcoin grants round  advocacy round which focuses on helping to fund advocacy organizations like fight for the future who sit at the intersection of tech and crypto activismthe remaining  will be used as matching funds for a forefront sideround an opportunity for forefront to fund key partners organizations and individuals within our communitymotivationfrom public goods create universally better outcomes for society for those trapped in poverty public goods are particularly essential helping people meet basic needs public libraries for example  assuming all else equal can help educate the population indiscriminately once again this assumes the library offers truly equal opportunities to learn and check out the resources neededpublic goods also serve those in privilege and power just as equally as those in poverty we often dont notice it but the majority of the value we consume in the world is public goods after all what value is your lambo to you if the sky is on fire funding public goods ensuring they exist and are accessible is often paramount to a societys advancementforefront dao is heavily dependent on public goods from open source software to policy and research organizations pushing forward thinking and fighting for core principles of  outside of the practical case though funding public goods is morally good as the port of entry to  we have a responsibility to create and promote the culture that we want to see throughout the space we should fund public goods because it is the right thing to do and we should promote a culture that encourages the moral case rather than the practical oneat the same time gitcoins focus on quadratic funding is an exciting opportunity for forefront to begin funding projects within our ecosystem to accelerate our progress as a dao the social token space is growing rapidly and forefront has the opportunity to establish itself as a critical pillar in the ecosystemdetails advocacy roundthe gitcoin advocacy round will be handled entirely by gitcoin our only role will be funding  and promoting the roundforefront will be a matching partner for more details on gitcoin grants quadratic funding and matching funds please  this is extremely important  to understand how gitcoin works and what forefronts role will be forefront sideroundin addition to the gitcoin advocacy round gitcoin will support forefronts own sideround this will be an opportunity for the forefront community to select and support key projects partners and stakeholders within our ecosystem the sideround will also use quadratic funding  matching funds so please read the article linked above for more claritywe propose that forefront dao appoints a sideround committee to coordinate the logistics of the sideround and select the projects that will be included for fundingthe committee should include   one forefront staff member   one culture guild member   one growth guild member   one writers guild membereach guild will be responsible for appointing a representative to the sideround committee within three days of this proposal passing the committee will have full autonomy to develop a process to select projects for the sideround voteyes  vote yes to approve forefront public goods funding proposalno  vote no to not approve forefront public goods funding proposalvalue culture community

development of the communityas the forefront dao looks to expand its operations and onboard full time contributors a diversified and sustainable treasury has become apparent derisking the treasury title: Forefront Season One

clean_body2: summarythis proposal is intended to bring the concept of seasons to forefront  ff season one for a period of  days starting july  comprehensive outline can be found on the  motivationa season is a bounded period of time where the forefront community can align on projects and experiments that help us achieve our broader missionwhile the grand vision for forefrontâ€™s longterm future may differ for different community members seasons allow us to build consensus around what highlevel steps we are taking over a fixed period of timeup until this point forefront has been in what weâ€™ll call the â€œpreseasonâ€ phase â€“ focusing less on architecture and more on managing our community garden our hope is that season one will be a step forward in strengthening forefronts position as the leader of the social token space while also building strong relationships with existing and upcoming communities specification bring ff season one to forefront if passed ff season one will run for a period of  days starting july  introduce guilds contributor types and new governance process approve a max allocation of  ff for season one expenses  ff for core operations expenses and  ff allocation for each guild payout allocation will run monthly andor perproject basis voteyes  vote yes to bring ff season one to forefrontno  vote no to not bring ff season one to forefrontvalue culture community

body: proposal signal community dao would like adopt gitcoin foundation exempted cayman foundation company legal entity take possession steward multiple assets gitcoin holdingsfor full details please see governance post herehere tldrthe community dao need legal entity claim many assets currently possession gitcoin holdings focus exclusively growing mission philanthropic worknext stepsthis vote official signal communal intent take formal legal ownership assets gitcoin holdings establish gitcoin foundation legal entity represents us dao token holders community membersassuming vote passes begin negotiations gitcoin holdings procure assets bring back terms deal community review part term negotiations also review ratify governing bylaws foundation ensure token holders near total control actions taken foundationan initial draft set bylaws found updated negotiations ensuecall actionthis vote signal would like adopt gitcoin foundation represent community negotiations vote allow anyone else unilaterally accept terms negotiation second separate vote ensure details discussed debated
author: 0xc2E2B715d9e302947Ec7e312fd2384b5a1296099
clean_title2: should we adopt the gitcoin foundation and take legal possession of philanthropic assets from gitcoin holdings
clean_body2: this proposal is to signal that we as a community and dao would like to adopt the gitcoin foundation an exempted cayman foundation company as our legal entity to take possession of and steward multiple assets from gitcoin holdingsfor full details please see our governance post herehere is the tldrthe community and dao need a legal entity to own and claim many of the assets currently in possession of gitcoin holdings such that we can focus exclusively on growing our mission and philanthropic worknext stepsthis vote is the official signal of our communal intent to take formal legal ownership of these assets from gitcoin holdings and establish the gitcoin foundation as the legal entity that represents us  the dao token holders community membersassuming this vote passes i will begin negotiations with gitcoin holdings to procure assets and bring back those terms of the deal to the community to review as part of those term negotiations we will also review and ratify the governing bylaws for the foundation to ensure token holders have near total control of actions taken by the foundationan initial draft set of bylaws can be found here which will be updated as negotiations ensuecall to actionthis vote is to signal we would like to adopt the gitcoin foundation and have me represent the community in these negotiations this vote does not allow me or anyone else to unilaterally accept terms of the negotiation we will have a second separate vote to ensure the details are discussed and debated

title: GR13 Matching Pool Allocations
body: snapshot vote looking finalize decision around gitcoin grants round allocations proposed discussed forum post abstractprior grants round pool governed categories assigned specific percentages pool grants specific disciplines geographiesin grants round community voted run experiment proposed public goods funding workstream test vitalik theory quadratic funding effective allocating funds allocation via categories away specific grant categories grants listed together took step towards simplifying decentralizing matching whole public goods funding workstream believes experiment success directionally least believe experiment helpful getting funding grants without complaints top earners allowed us test assumptions removing categoriesa statement pgf workstreamwe know sure yet main pool approach works best longterm know major benefits longer tail grantees exceeded expectations despite bugs think worth trying drastically change coursevotevotingthe forum post outlined three options continue cap continue cap different percentage proposed community completely new communityled proposal anyone want put new structure forth period forum post receive specific proposals different percentages structures try result structuring vote followsfor repeat main pool capstick exactly individual grant matching contribution amount shall exceed overall matching pool fund ie poolagainst alternate proposalselect option alternate proposal would like table please post proposal associated details forum soon vote

author: 0x0CF30daf2Fb962Ed1d5D19C97F5f6651F3b691c1
clean_body2: this snapshot vote is looking to finalize a decision around the gitcoin grants round  allocations proposed and discussed in this forum post abstractprior to grants round  the pool was governed by categories that assigned specific percentages of the pool to grants in specific disciplines or geographiesin grants round  the community voted to run an experiment proposed by the public goods funding workstream to test vitalikâ€™s theory that quadratic funding should be as effective at allocating funds as allocation via categories by doing away with specific grant categories and having all grants listed together we took a step towards simplifying and decentralizing matching on the whole the public goods funding workstream believes the experiment was a success â€“ directionally at the very least we believe the experiment was helpful in getting funding to more grants without complaints from top earners and allowed us to test our assumptions about removing categoriesa statement from the pgf workstreamwe donâ€™t know for sure yet if the main pool approach works best longterm but we do know that there were major benefits for a longer tail of grantees and that it exceeded our expectations despite bugs and we think itâ€™s worth trying again before we drastically change coursevotevotingthe forum post outlined three options â€“ to continue with the cap at  to continue with the cap at a different percentage as proposed by the community or a completely new communityled proposal should anyone want to put a new structure forth during the period the forum post was up we did not receive any specific proposals for different percentages or structures to try in  a result we are structuring the vote as followsfor repeat main pool with  capstick to exactly what we did in  individual grantâ€™s matching contribution amount shall exceed  of the overall matching pool fund ie  of the  poolagainst alternate proposalselect this option if you have an alternate proposal you would like to table please post that proposal and all its associated details in the forum as soon as you vote

title: Gitcoin DAO - Workstream Accountability Flow
body: proposals follow format going forwardthis proposal seeks amend improve standardise proposal process gitcoin dao purpose standardisation attempt improve transparency accountability accessibility comes proposal review processes new improved proposal frameworkall proposals ideally follow following formata tldr section top proposal summarizing main points increased transparency smoother decision making processif applicable milestone report containing goals achieved previous quarter milestone report include number current contributors marked ft pt funds spent date perhaps adopting quarterly reporting funds carrying next quarter notable achievements quarter actions workstream brought back value daotreasury applicablequantifiablenb flow proposal still follow steps laid gov process accountability metrics could form basis workstream health cardsreports may serve catalyst self improvement opportunity bring greater transparency collaboration accountability dao ecosystem largeall details proposal found
author: 0x54BeCc7560a7Be76d72ED76a1f5fee6C5a2A7Ab6
clean_body2: all proposals should follow this format going forwardthis proposal seeks to amend improve and standardise the proposal process for gitcoin dao the purpose of this standardisation attempt is to improve transparency accountability and accessibility when it comes to proposal review processes new improved proposal frameworkall proposals should ideally follow the following formata tldr section at the top of the proposal summarizing the main points this is for increased transparency and a smoother decision making processif applicable a milestone report containing goals achieved during the previous quarter the milestone report should include  number of current contributors marked as ft or pt  funds spent to date  perhaps adopting some quarterly reporting  any funds carrying over to the next quarter  notable achievements for the quarter  have the actions of the workstream brought back value into the daotreasury if applicablequantifiablenb the flow of a proposal will still follow the steps laid out in the gov process  and other accountability metrics could form the basis of workstream health cardsreports that may serve not only as a catalyst for self improvement but as an opportunity to bring greater transparency collaboration and accountability into the dao ecosystem at largeall details of our proposal can be found here

clean_title2: redistribute gtc to individuals who could not claim due to error
clean_body2: summaryif this proposal passes we plan to distribute  gtc using whalerdaoâ€™s astrodrop tool to the users below who were eligible for the gtc airdrop in may  tried to claim their gtc during the airdrop window but were not able to claim due to an error in the system ingesting their transactionsabstractthe gtc airdrop earlier this year was a great step towards the decentralization of the gitcoin ecosystem unfortunately there are several users who were eligible for the drop because they funded the project force dao before the cutoff date for the airdrop however due to an error in the transaction validator these users were unable to claim their tokens specifically when these users went to claim their tokens within the  airdrop window they were not allocated a percent of gtc tokens for their donations to force dao after speaking with users and investigating online it seems that those transactions were incorrectly dropped before the airdrop period after some of these users reported it they eventually had their transactions readded but after the cutoff date this proposal is looking to retroactively compensate those users who were not able to claim their gtc due to the error we will compensate the users linked below all these users have demonstrated the necessary proof to be eligible for the airdrop and were responsive throughout the proposal process we had two criteria in order to show eligible  proof of original donation which meets the original airdrop  proof of an attempted claim during the original airdrop periodif passed we wish to distribute the specified amount view linked pdf for exact amounts through whalerdaoâ€™s astrodrop the total amount of gtc to be distributed to these users is  list of users  budget breakdown read the full proposal  distribution tool

body: snapshot vote looking finalize decision around gitcoin grants round allocations proposed discussed abstractgitcoin historically utilized categories based grant types determine matching pool allocations based percentage overall matching pool fund grant rounds finale event overall strategy questioned vitalik buterin argument quadratic funding effective grant rounds using categoriesduring public goods funding workstream wants test vitalik theory quadratic funding effective allocating funds allocation via categories away specific grant categories grants listed together hope simplify decentralize matching radical change historically set matching funds grants matching pools challenge believe help better understand best implement quadratic funding outlines detail snapshot vote decide test approach three options vote areoption single pool experimentuse test case run experiment whereby away categoriesthe main pool single matching pool funddistribution matching round individual grant matching contribution amount shall exceed overall matching pool fund ie get run proper experiment try new approach fundingcons experiment unknown vs tried trusted categoriesoption experimentstick categorybased approach using past specifically run categories less uncertainty rinse repeat prior round approachcons remain dark single pool might perform option matching pot single pool experiment categorybased beforethis option proposed response governance proposal outlined option proposed happy medium going gradually vs fullon experiment get experiment bit maintaining category approach half poolcons complex potentially confusing grantees
author: 0x7E052Ef7B4bB7E5A45F331128AFadB1E589deaF1
clean_body2: this snapshot vote is looking to finalize a decision around the gitcoin grants round  allocations proposed and discussed abstractgitcoin has historically utilized categories based on grant types to determine matching pool allocations based on a percentage of the overall matching pool fund during grant rounds during the  finale event this overall strategy was questioned by vitalik buterin the argument being quadratic funding should be just as effective during grant rounds using no categoriesduring  the public goods funding workstream wants to test vitalikâ€™s theory that quadratic funding should be as effective at allocating funds as allocation via categories by doing away with specific grant categories and having all grants listed together we hope to simplify and decentralize matching this is a radical change in how weâ€™ve historically set matching funds for grantsâ€™ matching pools but a challenge we believe will help to better understand how to best implement quadratic funding outlines the above in more detail â€“ and this snapshot vote will decide if and how we test this approach in  three options to vote on areoption  single pool experimentuse  as a test case to run an experiment whereby we do away with categoriesthe  main pool will be a single matching pool funddistribution of  in matching for the round no individual grantâ€™s matching contribution amount shall exceed  of the overall matching pool fund ie  we get to run a proper experiment and try out a new approach to fundingcons the experiment is an unknown vs our tried  trusted categoriesoption  no experimentstick with the same categorybased approach weâ€™ve been using in the past â€“ specifically run  with the same categories as  less uncertainty rinse  repeat prior round approachcons we remain in the dark as to how a single pool might perform option  do a   of the matching pot as a single pool experiment and  categorybased as beforethis option was proposed in response to the governance proposal that outlined option  this was proposed as a â€˜happy mediumâ€™ â€“ going more gradually vs doing a fullon experiment in  we get to experiment a bit while maintaining the category approach for half the poolcons having both at once is more complex and potentially very confusing for grantees

title: oneGTC: A $GTC Backed Economy
body: proposal first kind aimed treasury optimization creating sustainable method distributing gtc gitcoindao workstreams benefits proposal stable token gitcoindao allows dao fund work streams certainty instead victims market fluctuation using onegtc preferred token rewarding contributions workstreams lead retaining value within gitcoin ecosystem allocation proposed forum initial proposal open commentsfeedback discussed stewards wider community weeks engaging ichi community discussing potential benefits use cases clarifying value proposition using native stable coin gathered enough support bring vote voting yes vote yes voting support proposal create onegtc token backed mix gtc usdc also voting approve gtc token budget allocated bootstrapping token treasury voting vote voting proposal current form community selects yes end voting period keyholders community multisig notified workstream payments allocated onegtc treasury community selects action taken stage discussion continue find optimal outcome
choices: ['Yes, I support oneGTC', "No, I don't support oneGTC"]
author: 0x66b1De0f14a0ce971F7f248415063D44CAF19398
clean_body2: this proposal is the first of its kind aimed at treasury optimization and  creating a more sustainable method for distributing gtc to the gitcoindao workstreams a few benefits to this proposal  having a stable token for the gitcoindao allows the dao to fund work streams with certainty instead of being victims of market fluctuation using onegtc as the preferred token for rewarding contributions to workstreams will lead to retaining more value within the gitcoin ecosystem this allocation was proposed on the forum in this initial proposal  ðŸ‘€open for commentsfeedback discussed by stewards and the wider community for over  weeks after engaging with the ichi community discussing the potential benefits use cases and clarifying the value proposition of using a native stable coin we have gathered enough support to bring it to a vote  voting yes if you vote yes you are voting in support of a proposal to create a onegtc token that will be backed by a mix of gtc and usdc you are also voting to approve a  gtc token budget to be allocated for the bootstrapping of the token treasury  voting no if you vote no you are voting against this proposal in its current form if the community selects yes by the end of the voting period keyholders of the community multisig will be notified that the workstream payments will be allocated into the onegtc treasury if the community selects no no action will be taken at this stage and discussion will continue to find an optimal outcome

title: Implement Akita sale/stream as a Balancer pool
body: proposal came late one options poll moment leading sell stream liquidate propose discussion merits implement posted june gathered positive feedback many community representatives issue two main proposals theres enough market depth liquidate akita tokens without losing lot value gitcoin even serious doubts long term viability akita community responsibility maximize value gained gitcoin locking akita sablier doesnt put capital good use market crashes recovers crashes stream missed opportunity proposed sell akita exchange put gitcoin sell yet another eth create scheduled balancer pool eth obtained step remaining set pool controller programmatically change ratio period p inverts eth akita eth period community decide remaining tokens types pools usually called liquidity bootstrapping pools often used launch new tokens dont liquidity case token launched would still bootstrap liquidity read lbps article make sure market doesnt dump immediately could step using would take buy pressure immediately make sure starting price lbp closer market makers end result end period gitcoin sold akita fairer market price similarly dollar cost averaging strategy akita community gets much liquid market billion dollars deep emphasis air quotes reduce impact single seller final price trades executed pool earn fees gitcoin periods high volatility gitcoin leveraging massive akita holdings generate yield constant sell pressure akita one scheduled known variants risksbalancer pools quite flexible could options like pool starts akita gtc eth dai could add dog tokens big billion dollar pile dog poo moneypools also dont necessarily need locked add smart controller gitcoin dao accelerate schedule later vote simply change completely use ratios changed gtc holders also point gitcoin could vote take liquidity pool receive either token poolits also important note lbps different selling token pool wants keep constant ratio times reach target means pool sell buy akita eth keep target ratio thats amms work lbp changes target ratio slowly time also reacting market real time means akita drops near pool automatically buying akita eth reaches desired balance almost eth would drained pool eth came akita sale step end result would strategy stream liquidate anyway hand market goes mean pool start selling cheap akita bought back eth plus fees got period pools make money volatility disclaimer work balancer labs community wants use solutions balancer also lbp referral program perfectly willing either claim donate bal gained gitcoin period pthis proposal leaves p period open ending date poll resolution votes take result snapshot stream lbp duration intermediary make lbp last liquidation short lbp lbp lbp lock sablier dump uniswap depending results akita poll
choices: ['Stream: duration of 2 years', 'Intermediary: duration of 1 year', 'Liquidation: duration of 1 week', 'Other type of LBP', "Don't do an LBP at all"]
author: 0x809FA673fe2ab515FaA168259cB14E2BeDeBF68e
clean_title2: implement akita salestream as a balancer pool
clean_body2: this proposal came too late to be one of the options in the  poll which at the moment is leading with sell  stream  and liquidate  so i will propose it as a further discussion on the merits of how to implement it this was posted on june  as a  and gathered some positive feedback from many of the community representatives the issue with the two main proposals theres not enough market depth to liquidate all akita tokens without losing a lot of value for gitcoin even if there are serious doubts about the long term viability of the akita community we have a responsibility to maximize the value gained for gitcoin  locking akita on sablier doesnt put that capital to good use and if the market crashes and recovers and crashes again during before the stream is over then there was a missed opportunity the proposed  sell  of akita in any exchange put it in the gitcoin  sell yet another  into eth  create a scheduled balancer pool with the  eth obtained in step  and all the remaining  set up the pool controller to programmatically change the ratio over a period p so that it inverts from a  eth  akita into a  eth and   after period is over the community can decide what to do with the remaining tokens those types of pools are usually called liquidity bootstrapping pools and are often used to launch new tokens that dont have liquidity in this case the token has launched but it would still bootstrap the liquidity you can read more about lbps on this article about to make sure the market doesnt dump immediately we could do step  and  using  this would take off some buy pressure immediately and then make sure the starting price of the lbp is closer to what other market makers have the end result is that at the end of the period gitcoin will have sold most of their akita at a fairer market price similarly to a dollar cost averaging strategy akita community gets a much more liquid market a billion dollars deep emphasis on the air quotes this will reduce the impact any single seller can have on the final price all trades that are executed against this pool will earn fees for gitcoin so in periods of high volatility gitcoin is leveraging its massive akita holdings to generate yield there will be a constant sell pressure on akita but its one that is scheduled and known variants and risksbalancer pools are quite flexible and we could do other options like having a pool that starts at  akita  gtc  eth and  dai or we could add all the dog tokens into a big billion dollar pile of dog poo moneypools also dont necessarily need to be locked we can add a smart controller so that gitcoin dao can accelerate the schedule at a later vote or simply change it completely and use the  so that ratios can be changed at the will of gtc holders also at any point gitcoin could vote to take the liquidity out of its own pool and receive it in either token of the poolits also important to note that lbps are different than just selling a token the pool wants to keep a constant ratio at all times to reach its target be it   or  so it means that the pool will both sell and buy akita for eth to keep the target ratioâ€“thats how amms work a lbp changes that target ratio slowly over time but it also is reacting to the market in real time it means that if akita drops to near  then the pool will automatically be buying akita with eth until it reaches the desired balance so almost eth would be drained from the pool but that eth came from the akita sale in the step  and the end result would be the same if the strategy was to stream or liquidate it anyway on the other hand if the market goes up again that will mean the pool will start selling the cheap akita it bought back to eth plus the fees it got during the period which is why pools make money from volatility disclaimer i work for balancer labs but if the community wants to they can use other solutions balancer also has a lbp referral program but i am perfectly willing to either not claim it or to donate the bal gained to gitcoin period pthis proposal leaves the p period open the ending date of this poll is after the resolution of the  so votes should take the result of the other snapshot in  stream a lbp of duration of   intermediary make the lbp last   liquidation a short lbp over   do an lbp but in  or  no lbp just lock it sablier or dump it all in uniswap depending on the results of the akita poll

title: Impose Governance Standards & Processes
body: backgroundthere currently three votes around akita held gitcoin multisig one seemingly somewhat contradictory mandates standards processes put place yet establish occurs scenario x ie occurs two contradictory votes pass prior execution first double jeopardy extent proposalthis proposal rather meta proposal begin set proposals set standards processes proposers must follow ensure validity enforceability set rules issues double jeopardy proposal parameter validity start time end time start block etc proposal process validity template forum snapshot onchain etc prior artyam first establish number rules look potentially impose standards offchain voting many protocols followed since better others yam established rules considered valid offchain vote start date must always future amount time creation end date must run x amount start block must within x minutes vote start timeany vote meet said criteria would considered invalid potentially censored snapshot controllers associated ens like benchmarks standards general spammers wont follow weeded quickly easily well ensuring fairnesstime prepare votes killing two birds one stone
choices: ['Yes, begin standards creation', 'No, potential for censorship']
author: 0x683A78bA1f6b25E29fbBC9Cd1BFA29A51520De84
clean_body2: backgroundthere are currently three votes around what to do with the akita held by the gitcoin multisig each one seemingly have somewhat contradictory mandates this is because there have not been standards and processes put in place as of yet that establish what occurs in scenario x if y ie what occurs when two contradictory votes pass prior to execution of the first double jeopardy to some extent proposalthis proposal is rather meta it is a proposal to begin a set of proposals to set standards and processes that proposers must follow to ensure validity and enforceability we should set rules for issues such as double jeopardy proposal parameter validity start time end time start block etc proposal process validity template forum  snapshot  onchain etc prior artyam was the first to establish a number of rules that we can look at for how to potentially impose standards for offchain voting many protocols have followed since some better than others yam established rules for what is considered a valid offchain vote  start date must always be in the future and have some amount of time  from creation of the  end date must run for x amount of  start block must be within x minutes of vote start timeany vote that does not meet said criteria would be considered invalid and potentially censored from snapshot by controllers of the associated ens what i like about the above benchmarks for standards is that in general most spammers wont follow the above and can be weeded out quickly and easily as well as ensuring fairnesstime to prepare for votes killing two birds with one stone

title: Proposal: Transfer SACKS/ETH LP from Multisig to Governance Timelock
body: continued gitcoin forumcurrently held allows greater flexibility using lp assets fund grants matching rounds hand flexibility could make users nervous holding sacks fear losing liquidityid like propose transferring lp position creates day delay submitting proposal remove liquidity actually removed day proposal delay period day voting period day timelock greater confidence hopefully lead greater long term funding impact sacks position
choices: ['Yes, transfer LP to GTC timelock', 'No, leave LP in grants multisig']
author: 0x8d07D225a769b7Af3A923481E1FdF49180e6A265
clean_title2: proposal transfer sackseth lp from multisig to governance timelock

author: 0x1c321Fc53bEF33a25F97c506439C675b95A4c046
clean_title2: no costforfeit to swap fidu into backer nfts
clean_body2: summaryas an investor on goldfinch we would like to use fidu to invest in select junior tranches to get backer nfts without incurring withdrawal costs and without forfeiting gfi rewards we believe that it will bring additional liquidity into junior tranches  fidu as the entry point for investingÂ it will make it easier for senior liquidity providers to act as backers when they spot a junior investment that they find attractive we believe that senior investing is a good entry point for newcomers to the goldfinch protocols so this would lower the barrier to becoming a backer it will also enable institutional investors to place their capital in senior tranches to earn a passive income while they scout junior investment opportunities on  junior financing predictabilityÂ part of the funds in the fidu will thus become available to invest in junior tranches over time patterns will emerge on the volume of financing that converts from fidu into junior investing opportunities descriptionwe seek to invest in junior tranches as backer but junior investments are not always available until such an investment is available we need to place our funds in a liquid asset outside of the goldfinch ecosystem currently when there is no junior investment available we can farm yield on compound and other protocols but we would rather place our funds in fidu to earn yield from borrower pools  compound yieldthe main issue currently is that if we use fidu staked for less than  months we have to forfeit part of our gfi rewards to redeem the usdc and use them to invest in a junior tranche this is because the gfi distributions received from liquidity mining unlock linearly over the first  months of staking this means that while one can withdraw their fidu whenever they like if they withdraw before  months they will forfeit some of their gfi distributions for example after  months theyâ€™d forfeit  after  months theyâ€™d forfeit  and so on after  months they will continue to receive distributions and will never forfeit any gfithe second issue is the withdrawal fee a charge of  is applied to all redemptions of fiduboth of these issues result in structural incentives that keep investment capital earmarked for junior tranches outside of the goldfinch ecosystemto make it economically viable to store funds in fidu to invest in junior on goldfinch we propose to enable fidu holders to use their fidu to invest in junior tranches at the exchange rate without incurring penalties on gfi rewards and without paying withdrawal fees specification and requirementsspecification enable fidu holders to exchange fidu for backers nfts without incurring withdrawal fees nor forfeiting gfi rewards a user would exchange their fidu for an nft representing their investment in a junior tranche behind the scene the following would happen     swap fidu in a transaction feeless exchange for usdc via the poolsol contract     burn the fidu in poolsol     deposit usdc into the tranchedpoolsol in exchange for a junior nft    benefits makes it easier for senior liquidity providers to act as backers when they spot a junior investment that they find attractive it makes it possible to have a goldfinchcentric investment strategy enables borrower pools to fill up faster since senior capital already locked in fidu can also be invested in junior since fidu can be used to invest in junior it would make it easier to estimate the availability of financing for borrowersdownside there may be some additional volatility in the availability of senior capital for all borrowersproposal discussionÂ votingâ€œyesâ€  no costforfeit to swap fidu into backer nftsâ€œnoâ€  no change

clean_body2: proposal title retroactive backer distribution proposal  same as  with ammendmentproposal authors blake west and mike sall cofounders warbler labssummary of proposalbuilding on the proposal by velvetdoctor and  and using the â€œcappedâ€ concept in the proposal by cognitiveliberty which is also how the lp airdrop worked this proposal suggests that goldfinch allocates a separate retroactive reward  to backers as well as implements ongoing liquidity mining for backers see full data behind the proposed airdrop here more concretely this proposal suggests two things for consideration by the  for the retroactive backer airdrop to give them  apyâ€™s of the lp airdrop  this is broken up into  â€œpartsâ€ a â€œcappedâ€ reward an â€œuncapped rewardâ€ a â€œrisk bonusâ€ and â€œtheoretical liquidity miningâ€ for the pools already contributed to but which will not be able to participate in backer liquidity mining once it is turned on each item is explained in detail belowallocating  for backer liquidity mining to be activated as soon as possible  this proposal also explains how backer liquidity mining works and suggests keeping the  allocation previously describedthe full proposal with the community discussion can be found here the ammendment with the community discussion can be found herevotingâ€œyesâ€  means allocate  of gfi to early backers as a retroactive airdrop and allocate  to backer liquidity mining as already designed and deployedâ€œnoâ€  means do nothing

title: MOSS IMPROVEMENT PROPOSAL 1
body: summarythis aims create foundation rules trading minting distribution communitytheir current approved projects certifications santa maria redd vcs social madre de dios redd vcs ccb gold community climate biodiversity agrocortex vcs social fazenda fortaleza ituxi project unitor redd project vcs amazon rio redd ifm vcs ccb proposal moss trading policythe trading policy moss sell otc counter via market makers directly buyers volumes representing adtv average daily trading volume trailing days tokenization policythe minting policy mint via moss community batches volumes representing adtv average daily trading volume trailing days tokenization distributionfrom tokenization new credits split rate moss community opportunityhow community participatefirst necessary hold moss governance tokens buy carbon credits user buy carbon credits discounted prices discount moss governance token holders announced issuance approvedin order minimize avoid impacting price adversely tokens bought community batch mints vested days eventual selling pressure softened moss governance token quick reviewas moss project advances aim decentralize much thus created moss token governance token moss protocol allows hold comment participate discussions vote changes token new protocols note anyone moss holders submit proposals forum discussion subsequent snapshot vote goal avoid minimize dictatorial unilateral decisions moss management promote higher engagement legitimacy decision making leading collaborative governance processthe main decisions made moss management concerning token currently involve carbon credit acquisition tokenization minting new tokens hiring auditors strategic partnerships distribution support one twoway tokenization bridges daos hiring market makers listing new exchanges peculiar asset class requires much community engagement selfeducationfirst foremost want emphasize carbon credits assets exist independently moss token assetutility token thus digital certificate offchain ledger behind works much way commodity token like gold token altering quantity certain gold token alter value gold physical gold working ledger guaranteeing value token tokenized quantity small relative size overall gold market one must think tokens tokenized assets digital certificates coins tokens represent asset serve financing function thus issuing tokens funnel money founders project controllers rather serves facilitate transactions asset owners token works way noticed anxiety concerning fact official maximum supply token maximum supply concept apply token project token issuing tokens inflationary moss needs buy offchain carbon credits work ledger moss issues million tokens doubling current supply mean market cap stay equal addition inflationary thus force prices fall rather means moss necessarily acquired million carbon credits thus number carbon credits ledger doubled leading doubling market cap fact overall million supply tokens equivalent global carbon credit market doubling token supply would lead increase overall global market supply asset credits already exist thus impacting demandsupply dynamics thus price significantlythere asset tokens market counterintuitive tokenomics generally known since crypto buyers individuals led confusion expect establishing governance structure supply addition rules bring clarity market cap supply dynamics formal discussion forumthe moss forum hub formal discussion debate request comment rfc periods begin people make thoughts heard latest moss improvement proposals mips rfc originate internally community member third parties new carbon bridges wish integrate moss ecosystemafter rfc community onboard proposal formal mip drafted policy team posted forum informal poll acting temperature check suggest proposal may need alterations discussionnote community whole post mip temperature check votes proposals section forum anyone open general discussion topic post rfc general section snapshot votingafter passing informal poll forum official mips published snapshot core team formal onchain vote moss token holdersat time writing voting power snapshot determined amount moss owned onetoone ratio note actions subject mip votein event policy team core team wishes reserve new power mip vote required specific action change subject vote future vision moss decentralized governanceas klimadao founders wrote believe decentralization spectrum rather binary web institutions begin fully decentralized moss exception decentralization journey ideal moss must strive toward one potential issue limiting mip publication core team moss departments voting process turn rubber stamp changes planned centrally time goal decentralize many governance functions possible minimize dictatorial power exerted moss contributors core team ensure votes meaningfulhowever governance functions amenable systems instance onetoone token voting gamed via bribes exploited whales benefit expense protocol likewise opening publication mips snapshot holder moss could turn snapshot sprawling mess poorly structured proposalsas work decentralize aspects protocol research best practices seek community input optimal governance system functiona potential solution responsibly decentralize mip publication rights stewardship model representatives elected token holders committee publication rights snapshot controlled dedicated multisig requires level consensus among elected representatives proposal published promise adjust decision model evolvesnote adapted approve initial governance framework implement split new token issuance limit size otc trades approve initial governance framework
author: 0x9f08BFD816f4F3baE31dEE2e2f4119dcf25824AD
clean_body2: summarythis aims to create the foundation rules on  trading minting and distribution to the communitytheir current approved projects and their certifications are as  santa maria redd â€“ vcs  social  madre de dios redd â€“ vcs  ccb gold community climate  biodiversity  agrocortex â€“ vcs  social  fazenda fortaleza ituxi project â€“  unitor redd project vcs  amazon rio redd ifm vcs  ccb proposal moss trading policythe trading policy will be moss to sell otc over the counter via market makers or directly to buyers only volumes representing at most  of adtv average daily trading volume of the trailing  days tokenization policythe  minting policy will be to mint via moss or community batches only volumes representing at most  of adtv average daily trading volume of the trailing  days tokenization distributionfrom now on the tokenization of new credits will be split at this rate  moss  community opportunityhow can the community participatefirst it is necessary to hold moss governance tokens to buy carbon credits then the user can buy carbon credits at discounted prices  the discount for moss governance token holders will be announced after and if the issuance is approvedin order to minimize and avoid impacting the  price adversely all tokens bought on community batch mints will be vested for  days so that any eventual selling pressure is softened moss governance token a quick reviewas the moss project advances we will aim to decentralize it as much as we can we have thus created the moss tokenâ€”the governance token of the moss protocolâ€” which allows those who hold it to comment participate in discussions and vote on changes to the  token and new protocols note that anyone not only moss holders can submit proposals on our forum for a discussion and subsequent snapshot vote our goal is to avoid or minimize dictatorial or unilateral decisions by moss management and to promote a higher engagement and legitimacy of the decision making leading to a more collaborative governance processthe main decisions made by moss management concerning the  token currently involve carbon credit acquisition and tokenization minting of new  tokens hiring of auditors strategic partnerships for distribution support of one or twoway tokenization bridges and daos the hiring of market makers and listing in new exchanges a peculiar asset class that requires much community engagement and selfeducationfirst and foremost we want to emphasize that carbon credits are assets that exist independently of moss the  token is an assetutility token thus it is a digital certificate that has an offchain ledger behind it it works much in the same way as a commodity token like a gold token altering the quantity of a certain gold token does not alter the value of gold as there will be physical gold working as a ledger and guaranteeing the value of each token and as the tokenized quantity is small relative to the size of the overall gold market one must think of tokens for tokenized assets as â€œdigital certificatesâ€ and not as coins the tokens here represent the asset and do not serve any financing function thus issuing more tokens does not funnel money to the founders or project controllers but rather serves to facilitate transactions between asset owners the  token works the same way we have noticed anxiety concerning the fact that there is no official maximum supply for the  token but the maximum supply concept does not apply to the  token as it is not a project token issuing more  tokens is not inflationary as moss needs to buy offchain carbon credits to work as a ledger if moss issues  million more  tokens doubling the current supply it does not mean that the market cap will stay equal or that this addition will be inflationary and thus force prices to fall  rather it means that moss has necessarily acquired  million more carbon credits and thus the number of carbon credits and ledger has doubled leading to a doubling of the market cap in fact the overall  million supply of  tokens is equivalent to  of the global carbon credit market doubling the token supply would not lead to a  increase in the overall global market supply of the asset as the credits already exist thus not impacting demandsupply dynamics and thus price significantlythere are very few asset tokens in the market so this is counterintuitive to most tokenomics generally known and since most crypto buyers are individuals this has led to some confusion we expect that by establishing a governance structure and supply addition rules we can bring clarity to this market cap and supply dynamics formal discussion forumthe moss  forum is the hub for more formal discussion and debate request for comment rfc periods begin here where people can make their thoughts heard on the latest moss improvement proposals mips an rfc can originate internally from a community member or from third parties such as new carbon bridges who wish to integrate into the moss ecosystemafter the rfc if the community is onboard with the proposal a formal mip will be drafted by the policy team which will be posted on the forum with an informal poll  acting as a temperature check to suggest if the proposal may need alterations or further discussionnote the community as a whole can post mip temperature check votes in the â€œproposalsâ€ section of the forum anyone can open a general discussion topic or post an rfc in the â€œgeneralâ€ section snapshot votingafter passing the informal poll on the forum official mips will be published on snapshot by the core team for a formal onchain vote by moss token holdersat the time of writing voting power on snapshot is determined by the amount of moss owned in a onetoone ratio note that not all actions are subject to a mip votein the event that the policy team or core team wishes to reserve a new power such that a mip vote is not required for a specific action this change will itself be subject to a vote future vision for moss decentralized governanceas klimadao founders wrote we believe that â€œdecentralization is a spectrum rather than a binaryâ€ â€œfew if any web  institutions begin fully decentralized and moss is no exception decentralization is a journey an ideal that moss must strive towardâ€ one potential issue with limiting mip publication to the core team and moss departments is that the voting process can turn into a â€œrubber stampâ€ of changes planned centrally over time our goal is to decentralize as many governance functions as possible minimize any dictatorial power exerted by the moss contributors or core team and ensure that votes are meaningfulhowever not all governance functions are amenable to the same systems  for instance onetoone token voting can be gamed via bribes or exploited by whales to benefit themselves at the expense of the protocol likewise opening up the publication of mips on snapshot to any holder of moss could turn snapshot into a sprawling mess of poorly structured proposalsas we work to decentralize more aspects of the protocol we will research best practices and seek community input on the optimal governance system for each functiona potential solution to responsibly decentralize mip publication rights is a stewardship model where representatives are elected by token holders to a committee that has publication rights to snapshot controlled by a dedicated multisig that requires some level of consensus among the elected representatives before the proposal is published we promise to adjust the decision model as it evolvesnote adapted from for approve initial governance framework implement  split of new token issuance limit the size of otc trades against do not approve the initial governance framework
