title: [Phase-3] [Binding] HIP-40: Clarification of image rules
body: hip title clarification image rules author nicobilinkiseth status phase created summarychange image rules explicitly forbid black white rotated also add max file size minimum resolution abstractcurrent rules clear among many aspects right black white images allowed registry rules say explicitly also days ago many profiles rotated images rejected registry believe us agree type images shouldnt allowed fair rules crystal clear among topics also images dont max file size min resolution declared policies implementationrewrite point policies follows frontfacing submitter picture required picture must include face submitter facing camera facial features must visible picture must color contain artificial modification facial features picture must minimum resolution picture must right orientation face recognized image rotation allowed face covered large piercings masks hindering visibility facial features neutral soft natural makeup without colored lipstick eyeliner eyeshadows acceptable makeup product item significantly alters modifies facial features allowed headcover covering internal region face acceptable example hijab acceptable submitter niqab include items worn daily ex headscarf turban wig etc provided violate previous points cannot include special items worn special occasions voluntarily involuntarily distract humans algorithms able detect identical faces
author: 0x17a91203A9E9C3519c2F76210497eF7F4BE2352F
clean_body2: hip  title clarification of image rules author nicobilinkiseth status phase  created  summarychange image rules to explicitly forbid black  white or rotated also add a max file size and a minimum resolution abstractcurrent rules are not clear among many aspects right now black and white images are not allowed in the registry but rules do not say so explicitly also a few days ago many profiles with  rotated images were rejected from the registry i believe most of us agree that those type of images shouldnt be allowed but its not fair that rules are not crystal clear among those topics also images dont have a max file size or a min resolution declared in the policies implementationrewrite the point  of the policies as follows  frontfacing submitter picture  required  the picture must include the face of the submitter facing the camera and the facial features must be visible the picture must be in color and not contain any artificial modification to the facial features the picture must be under  and have a minimum resolution of  by  the picture must be in the right orientation for the face to be recognized image rotation is not allowed  face should not be covered under large piercings or masks hindering the visibility of facial features   neutral soft and natural makeup without colored lipstick eyeliner or eyeshadows are acceptable any makeup product or item that significantly alters or modifies facial features is not allowed  headcover not covering the internal region of the face is acceptable for example a hijab is acceptable for a submitter but a niqab is not  it can include items worn daily ex headscarf turban wig etc provided they do not violate the previous points it cannot include special items worn only on special occasions that can voluntarily or involuntarily distract humans or algorithms from being able to detect identical faces

title: [Signaling][Phase 2]: HIP-41: Allow verbal confirmation for registrating users
body: hip allow verbal confirmation registrating usersauthors avsaeth nicobilinkisethstatus phase simple summarythis would add option user instead holding sign address give verbal confirmation public address either visual verbal confirmation would accepted abstractthe user onboarding able decide either make visual verbal confirmation public address video current rules profile submission require mandatory sign screen showing full ethereum address point failure many people although many efforts made help resolve problems allowing one character mistakes sign one step fight deepfakes considering facts believe feasible replace sign verbal confirmation instead showing sign eth address submitter would say loud series words confirm ownership address media files motivationthe advantages cleareasier flow user process one take video following simple instructions screenno props needed human need fish around get pen paper find second screen spend long time trying slowly copy addressmore accessible people movement vision impairment would make easier included systemdoesn exclude signs users still prefer hold signs maybe someone speech impaired shy still use visual confirmation address implementationbip wordsthe user must look camera say one officially acepted languages certify real human already registry identifier following identifier obtained converting hexadecimal ethereum address base converting digits user must speak first resulting words language phrase example address would spoken able barrel debris siege pretty inquiry commas spacing optionalthe phrase derived address would generated automatically dapp ui also would shown every profile chose verification method validators still curate list usual dictionary must language rest phrase future hip approves new language hip need updated future hip approves new official proof humanity language official dictionary yet hip adds new language must also define official word dictionary purposes hip
author: 0x17a91203A9E9C3519c2F76210497eF7F4BE2352F
clean_title2: allow verbal confirmation for registrating users
clean_body2: hip  allow verbal confirmation for registrating usersauthors avsaeth and nicobilinkisethstatus phase   simple summarythis would add the option to have a user instead of holding a sign with their address give a verbal confirmation of their public address either visual or verbal confirmation would be accepted abstractthe user when onboarding should be able to decide either to make a visual or verbal confirmation or both of their public address during their video the current rules for profile submission require a mandatory sign can be a screen showing the full ethereum address this has been a point of failure for many people although many efforts where made to help resolve those problems such as  allowing for one character mistakes the sign itself is just one more step to fight deepfakes considering all those facts we believe that its feasible to replace that sign with a verbal confirmation instead of showing a sign with the eth address the submitter would have to say out loud a series of words that confirm ownership of both address and media files motivationthe advantages are cleareasier flow as the user can do all the process in one take in the video by following simple instructions on screenno props needed human doesnâ€™t need to fish around to get a pen and a paper or find a second screen nor spend a long time trying to slowly copy the addressmore accessible for people with movement or vision impairment this would make it easier for them to be included in the systemdoesnâ€™t exclude signs users who still prefer to hold signs maybe someone who is speech impaired or just shy can still use visual confirmation of their address implementationbip  wordsthe user must look at the camera and say in one of the officially acepted languages i certify that i am a real human and that i am not already in this registry my identifier is following by an identifier which is obtained by converting the hexadecimal ethereum address into base  then converting those digits into  the user then must speak the first  resulting words in the same same language as the phrase  example the address  would be spoken as able barrel debris siege pretty inquiry commas and spacing are optionalthe phrase derived from the address would be generated automatically in the dapp ui also it would be shown on every profile that chose this verification method so that validators can still curate the list as usual the  dictionary must be in the same language as the rest of the phrase so when a future hip approves a new language this hip will not need to be updated if a future hip approves a new official proof of humanity language that does not have an official  dictionary yet then the hip that adds the new language must also define an official word dictionary for the purposes of this hip

title: [Phase 2][Signaling] HIP-40 Clarification of image rules
body: hip title clarification image rules author nicobilinkiseth status phase created summarychange image rules explicitly forbid black white rotated also add max file size minimum resolution abstractcurrent rules clear among many aspects right black white images allowed registry rules say explicitly also days ago many profiles rotated images rejected registry believe us agree type images shouldnt allowed fair rules crystal clear among topics also images dont max file size min resolution declared policiesmy proposal followingrewrite point policies frontfacing submitter picture required picture must include face submitter facing camera facial features must visible picture must color contain face modifying filters picture must minimum resolution picture must right orientation face recognized image rotation allowed face covered heavy makeup large piercings masks hindering visibility facial features headcover covering internal region face acceptable example hijab acceptable submitter niqab include items worn daily ex headscarf turban wig light makeup etc provided violate previous point cannot include special items worn special occasions voluntarily involuntarily distract humans algorithms able detect identical faces
author: 0x17a91203A9E9C3519c2F76210497eF7F4BE2352F
clean_body2: hip  title clarification of image rules author nicobilinkiseth status phase  created  summarychange image rules to explicitly forbid black  white or rotated also add a max file size and a minimum resolution abstractcurrent rules are not clear among many aspects right now black and white images are not allowed in the registry but rules do not say so explicitly also a few days ago many profiles with  rotated images were rejected from the registry i believe most of us agree that those type of images shouldnt be allowed but its not fair that rules are not crystal clear among those topics also images have a dont have a max file size or a min resolution declared in the policiesmy proposal here is the followingrewrite the point  of the policies  frontfacing submitter picture  required  the picture must include the face of the submitter facing the camera and the facial features must be visible the picture must be in color and not contain any face modifying filters the picture must be under  and have a minimum resolution of  by  the picture must be in the right orientation for the face to be recognized image rotation is not allowed  face should not be covered under heavy makeup large piercings or masks hindering the visibility of facial features headcover not covering the internal region of the face is acceptable for example a hijab is acceptable for a submitter but a niqab is not  it can include items worn daily ex headscarf turban wig light makeup etc provided they do not violate the previous point it cannot include special items worn only on special occasions that can voluntarily or involuntarily distract humans or algorithms from being able to detect identical faces

title: [Phase 3][Binding]: HIP-39: Election rules for elected officials
body: hip election rules elected officialsauthor mads engelundstatus link simple summarythis proposal implements rules members elected official positions elected defined expiration date currently mission board abstractthis proposal creates rules deal elections poh allowing member open election mandate post expires less three months candidates must solicited official channels motivationsoon mission board posts expire june time robust procedure elect new ones implementation mandate official poh position expires within months member may open election thread find replacement member opening thread called election moderator election moderator cannot hold election official post time creation official thread termination election several positions expire within months type opening thread thread must cover election positions type candidates must solicited communitymanaged see channels least one month must allowed finding candidates deadline must clearly communicated official thread candidates must declare intention run official thread election moderator within one week declaration deadline open approval voting vote snapshot candidates votes chosen available positionsspecific rules mission board mission board members whose post reelection cannot moderate rules election mission board members also excluded board votes topic election election moderator fails uphold requirements nonexcluded members mission board appoint new election moderator decision must justified board member pointing specific violations hip selfappointed election moderator
author: 0x77E851A926297fff2E6BC8FDbB5bB6087a617eC5
clean_body2: hip  election rules for elected officialsauthor mads engelundstatus   link simple summarythis proposal implements rules for how members are elected for official positions are elected with a defined expiration date  currently only the â€œmission boardâ€ abstractthis proposal creates rules for how to deal with elections in poh  allowing any member to open the election if the mandate of a post expires in less than three months candidates must be solicited on all official channels motivationsoon most of the mission board posts will expire june  at that time we should have a robust procedure to elect new ones implementation when a mandate for an official poh position expires within  months any member may open an election thread to find a replacement the member opening this thread will be called the election moderator the election moderator cannot hold or be up for the election of any official post from the time of the creation of the official thread until the termination of the election if several positions expire within  months of the same type at the opening of the thread then the thread must cover the election of all positions of the same type candidates must be solicited on all â€œcommunitymanagedâ€ see  channels and at least one month must be allowed for finding candidates and the deadline must be clearly communicated in the official thread all candidates must declare their intention to run in the official thread the election moderator can within one week of the declaration deadline open an approval voting vote on snapshot where the candidates with the most votes will be chosen for the available positionsspecific rules for the â€œmission boardâ€ â€œmission boardâ€ members whose post is up for reelection cannot moderate the rules for an election for the â€œmission boardâ€ itself such members will also be excluded from board votes on the topic of the election if the election moderator fails to uphold the requirements nonexcluded members of the â€œmission boardâ€ can appoint a new election moderator this decision must be justified by the board member pointing to specific violations of this hip of the selfappointed election moderator

title: [Phase-3][Binding] HIP-37 Set EPNS as a delegate for PoH notification channel
body: hip set epns delegate poh notification channelauthor aleix aleixklerosiostatus phase abstractthe poh dao rightful owner poh notification channel needs set delegate delegate permission send push notifications everyone channel setting epns delegate able notify everyone subscribes relevant information regarding poh profile notifications able send initially defined specification section note code notifications open source able modify expand notifications motivationthe epns team working giving poh good notification system action onchain last step start sending notifications specificationas commented last poh community call poh governor thus poh dao owner proof humanity notification channelthis means set epns address delegate allow send notifications channel notifications sending profile accepted profile removal request profile challenged profile expire new evidence uploadedthey give us access repository notifications code improve add new notifications implementationto implement hip execute following transaction ethereum mainnet chainrecipient data appendixsteps validate transaction data frame wallet installed add poh governor watch address visit connect click poh button enter channel administration tab click gear icon add delegate paste epns address click add delegate frame wallet popup click sending data validate raw transaction data one presented proposal
author: 0x9d9E26932d012b2Ab21B974fE1552F4025b1e1Cc
clean_title2: set epns as a delegate for poh notification channel
clean_body2: hip  set epns as a delegate for poh notification channelauthor aleix aleixklerosiostatus phase   abstractthe poh dao being the rightful owner of the poh notification channel needs to set up a delegate such that the delegate has permission to send push notifications to everyone on the channel after setting epns as delegate they will be able to notify to everyone that subscribes relevant information regarding their poh profile the notifications that they will be able to send initially are defined below in the specification section note that the code for these notifications will be open source and we will be able to modify and expand it with more notifications motivationthe epns team has been working on giving poh a good notification system this action onchain is the last step before they can start sending notifications specificationas commented on the last poh community call the poh governor and thus the poh dao is the owner of the proof of humanity notification channelthis means that now we have to set the epns address  as a delegate to allow them to send notifications on the channel the notifications that they will be sending for now are your profile has been accepted your profile has a removal request your profile has been challenged your profile is about to expire new evidence has been uploadedthey will give us access to the repository with the notifications code so we can improve and add new notifications implementationto implement this hip we have to execute the following transaction on the ethereum mainnet chainrecipient  data  appendixsteps to validate the transaction data with frame wallet installed add the poh governor  as a watch only address visit  and connect click on the poh button to enter the channel administration tab click on the gear icon and then â€œadd delegateâ€ paste the epns address  and click on â€œadd delegateâ€ on the frame wallet popup click on â€œsending dataâ€ and validate that the raw transaction data is the same one that is presented on this proposal

author: 0xfd1Af514B8b2bf00d1999497668BFF26Ccdf4C8a
clean_title2: hip  allow  mistakes in displayed addresses
clean_body2: hip  allow  mistakes in displayed addresseship  allow  mistakes in displayed addressesauthor mizu juanustatus phase   simple summarythis proposal would modify the registry policy to allow for limited mistakes or omissions in the address displayed in a profileâ€™s video abstractmany profiles get challenged due to mistakes affecting a single character in the address displayed by the submitter in their video this proposal would make it so a single such mistake would no longer be grounds for rejection this would not reduce the security of the profile or the poh registry in any practical terms as will be demonstrated belowmotivationsubmitters will often write down their address by hand instead of printing it or displaying it on another screen this might be because they donâ€™t have a printer or another device with a screen they can easily display it on or simply because they find writing the address by hand to be more convenient at that timeas one might expect it is often the case that submitters make mistakes when copying their address sometimes these are significant errors such as the omission of a large part of the address in which case it might be possible for an attacker to generate matching addresses but often the error will affect only one character we may distinguish  types of errors omitted character a character is omitted from the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œabdâ€ mistaken character a different character has been written in place of the one expected in that position eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€ swapped adjacent characters two characters adjacent to each other have been swapped eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œacbdâ€ additional character an additional character has been inserted anywhere in the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€this proposal would allow at most one of the above three errors in a displayed address the effects on the security of an address ie on the ability of an attacker to find a private key generating an address which would match the displayed address would be the following omitted character  bits   positions to insert the missing character which has  possible values mistaken character  bits   characters with  possible invalid values each swapped adjacent characters  bits   possible swaps of adjacent characters although note that this can be slightly lower still since not all swaps have an effect eg in â€œabbdâ€ swapping the two bs has no effect additional character  bits   choices for which character to deletenote that if a character is missing case  the three other cases are no longer allowed and conversely if the displayed address has all  characters case  and  the first and fourth cases are no longer allowed and if there is an extra character then only case  may be considered as a result the maximum security loss is            bits reducing the total security of an address from  to  bits given the low stakes involved in being able to create a fake profile with an existing poh registration video and the fact that no one is likely to be able to crack  bits of an ethereum key for the foreseeable future this should be an acceptable security compromiseat this point it is worth noting that there is one disadvantage to this proposal it will no longer be possible to find a personâ€™s profile from the video alone without trying all possible allowed errors which is to say  trials in the worst case this is easily remedied with a simple software loop but something to keep in mind specificationthe following text will be appended at the end of the first bullet point of subsection  of the â€œlist of current requiredoptional elements and submission rulesâ€a single one of the following errors occurring once will be tolerated in the displayed address omitted character a character is omitted from the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œabdâ€ mistaken character a different character has been written in place of the one expected in that position eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€ swapped adjacent characters two characters adjacent to each other have been swapped eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œacbdâ€ but not â€œadcbâ€ additional character an additional character has been inserted anywhere in the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€as stated on the effects on security  character does not add a great impact on security but it does greatly impact on ux and humans registering making honest mistakes it could be argued that in a future time we could be allowing more characters mistakes which would lead to a slippery slope the key point is to maintain security and adding more characters would have a greater impact on security  character mistakes can be considered as a good balance between honest mistakes while maintaining security mission board ratificationsince this hip has been recreated from an existing phase  the proposers have asked the mission boards to ratify the validity of this hip the boards vote on this phase  is proof enough that they confirm its validity see

potential amendments if it does he puts it to vote without delay proposers do not have any discretion in whether a proposal is put to vote or not it is a purely administrative task to avoid spam title: [Binding][Phase-3] Clarification on UBI DAO rules
body: hip clarification ubi dao rulesauthor clesaegestatus phase nonelanguages en simple summarythe hip clarifies ubi dao follow rules poh dao time proposal unless stated otherwise abstractthe ubi dao rules ones poh dao rules time unless stated otherwise ubi dao proposal motivation created ubi dao however proposal specific rules parameters dao except calculation voting power lead difference interpretation rules dao could lead disputes stalling execution proposals people wouldnt want take risk lose deposit kleros court rule interpretation rules new daowhen asked clarify rules board decided didnt wish rule asked hip clarifying rules proposal clarifies ubi dao starts rules poh dao time creation unless stated otherwiseits still possible ubi dao modify rulescurrent uip uip phases considered passed would passed clarified rules proposal specificationthe ubi dao rules sames poh dao rules time unless stated otherwise ubi dao proposal applies non exhaustive list voting period deposits governor app challenge period delegations uip process working like hip processit possible change rules via uips implementationthis proposal doesnt require coding simply clarifies rules execution ubi dao decisions
author: 0x2A52309eDF998799C4A8b89324CCAd91848c8676
clean_body2: hip  clarification on ubi dao rulesauthor clesaegestatus phase   with nonelanguages en simple summarythe hip clarifies that the ubi dao will follow the rules of the poh dao at the time of the proposal unless stated otherwise abstractthe ubi dao rules are the same ones the poh dao rules at the time of  unless stated otherwise in  or a ubi dao proposal motivation created the ubi dao however the proposal is not specific about rules and parameters of the dao except in the calculation of voting power this lead to difference of interpretation of the rules of the dao which could lead to disputes and stalling the execution of proposals as people wouldnt want to take the risk to lose their deposit if the kleros court were to rule against their interpretation of the rules of the new daowhen asked to clarify those rules the board decided that it didnt wish to rule on it and asked to have an hip clarifying the rules this proposal clarifies that the ubi dao starts with the same rules as the poh dao at the time of its creation unless stated otherwiseits still possible for the ubi dao to modify its own rulescurrent uip or uip phases are considered to have been passed if they would have passed with the clarified rules of this proposal specificationthe ubi dao rules are the sames the poh dao rules at the time of  unless stated otherwise in  or a ubi dao proposal this applies to non exhaustive list voting period deposits on the governor app challenge period delegations and uip process working like the hip processit is possible to change those rules via uips implementationthis proposal doesnt require any coding but simply clarifies the rules for execution of ubi dao decisions

â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œacbdâ€ additional character an additional character has been inserted anywhere in the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€this proposal would allow at most one of the above three errors in a displayed address the effects on the security of an address ie on the ability of an attacker to find a private key generating an address which would match the displayed address would be the following omitted character  bits   positions to insert the missing character which has  possible values mistaken character  bits   characters with  possible invalid values each swapped adjacent characters case  and  the first and fourth cases are no longer allowed and if there is an extra character then only case  may be considered as a result the maximum security loss is            bits it to vote without delay board members do not have any discretion in whether a proposal is put to vote or not it is a purely administrative task to avoid spam  invalid proposals from cluttering the interface in case a valid proposal were not to be put to vote within a week by any board member or delegate anyone can create a new snapshot page with a  days proposal changing the board composition and the official snapshot page it should include make no change and change the board composition and snapshot page it should also be displayed on the foruma board member can also post this proposal on the current snapshot pageif the amount of change the board composition and snapshot page votes on any of the snapshot page exceeds the amount of make no change on both snapshot pages the proposal changing the board and snapshot page is acceptedin case no proposal is created by a board member within the voting period of the proposal on the new snapshot page and the amount of change the board composition and snapshot page exceeds the amount of make no change the proposal changing the board and snapshot page is also accepted in case of proposalsvotes being censored by snapshot a similar process can be used to change the voting platform to a new platform in this case the board composition isnt changed a proof of humanity polls snapshot page can be created for non enforcing polling

author: 0x5385CA005a6192b19C3aB3e65B9cf96C83B49f0A
clean_title2: hip  allow  mistakes in displayed addresses
clean_body2: hip  allow  mistakes in displayed addressesauthor mizustatus phase   simple summarythis proposal would modify the registry policy to allow for limited mistakes or omissions in the address displayed in a profileâ€™s video abstractmany profiles get challenged due to mistakes affecting a single character in the address displayed by the submitter in their video this proposal would make it so a single such mistake would no longer be grounds for rejection this would not reduce the security of the profile or the poh registry in any practical terms as will be demonstrated below motivationsubmitters will often write down their address by hand instead of printing it or displaying it on another screen this might be because they donâ€™t have a printer or another device with a screen they can easily display it on or simply because they find writing the address by hand to be more convenient at that timeas one might expect it is often the case that submitters make mistakes when copying their address sometimes these are significant errors such as the omission of a large part of the address in which case it might be possible for an attacker to generate matching addresses but often the error will affect only one character we may distinguish  types of  omitted character a character is omitted from the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œabdâ€ mistaken character a different character has been written in place of the one expected in that position eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€ swapped adjacent characters two characters adjacent to each other have been swapped eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œacbdâ€ additional character an additional character has been inserted anywhere in the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€this proposal would allow at most one of the above three errors in a displayed address the effects on the security of an address ie on the ability of an attacker to find a private key generating an address which would match the displayed address would be the  omitted character  bits   positions to insert the missing character which has  possible  mistaken character  bits   characters with  possible invalid values  swapped adjacent characters  bits   possible swaps of adjacent characters although note that this can be slightly lower still since not all swaps have an effect eg in â€œabbdâ€ swapping the two bs has no  additional character  bits   choices for which character to deletenote that if a character is missing case  the three other cases are no longer allowed and conversely if the displayed address has all  characters case  and  the first and fourth cases are no longer allowed and if there is an extra character then only case  may be considered as a result the maximum security loss is            bits reducing the total security of an address from  to  bits given the low stakes involved in being able to create a fake profile with an existing poh registration video and the fact that no one is likely to be able to crack  bits of an ethereum key for the foreseeable future this should be an acceptable security compromiseat this point it is worth noting that there is one disadvantage to this proposal it will no longer be possible to find a personâ€™s profile from the video alone without trying all possible allowed errors which is to say  trials in the worst case this is easily remedied with a simple software loop but something to keep in mindit will also be desirable to make the conventional â€œâ€ prefix explicitly optional too since it does not really serve a purpose and people have occasionally been penalized for omitting it specificationthe following text will be appended at the end of the first bullet point of subsection  of the â€œlist of current requiredoptional elements and submission rulesâ€ the displayed address need not contain the prefix â€œâ€ a single one of the following errors occurring once will be tolerated in the displayed address   omitted character a character is omitted from the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œabdâ€  mistaken character a different character has been written in place of the one expected in that position eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€  swapped adjacent characters two characters adjacent to each other have been swapped eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œacbdâ€ but not â€œadcbâ€  additional character an additional character has been inserted anywhere in the address eg â€œabcdâ€ â†’ â€œâ€

title: [Phase-3][Binding] HIP-29: Deposit funds of the DAO to the UBI Burning Vaults
body: hip deposit funds dao ubi burning vaultsauthor santisiristatus phase nonelanguages en simple summarythe eth dai held dao deposited ubi burning vaults help reduce criculating supply ubi half generated yield assets workers dao paid using either ubidai ubiweth tokens helps set example dao treasuries abstractthe proof humanity dao currently holds eth kleros governor contract dai currently held multisig setup receive gitcoin grants order support burning ubi vaults implemented yearn finance community propose rather simply dao holding assets get deposited ubiweth ubidai vaults operational last two monthsthe dao hold ubiweth ubidai tokens setting clear example support treasury burning ubi action used example invite daos thing order support universal basic income ethereum hired workers dao future also directly paid either ubiweth ubidai tokens decide withdraw funds time want implementationthe vaults currently accessed end users currently capacity ubiweth vault found ubidai vault found eth converted weth first via uniswap dex swap weth available gets deposited ubiweth vaultdai transferred dao governor first deposited corresponding ubidai vault governor setup swap eth weth uniswap approval ubiweth vault use weth transfer available weth ubiweth vault approval ubidai vault use dai transfer available dai ubidai vault additional notesits critical future ubi builid liquidity vaults burning mechanisms works scale right vaults capped million dai eth respectively currently capacity setting clear example coming proof humanity dao promote action across entire ethereum ecosystem invite daos support ubi way
author: 0x2A52309eDF998799C4A8b89324CCAd91848c8676
clean_title2: deposit funds of the dao to the ubi burning vaults
clean_body2: hip  deposit funds of the dao to the ubi burning vaultsauthor santisiristatus phase   with nonelanguages en simple summarythe eth and dai held by the dao should be deposited on the ubi burning vaults this will help reduce criculating supply of ubi with half of the generated yield of these assets workers for the dao should be paid using either ubidai or ubiweth tokens this helps set an example for other dao treasuries out there abstractthe proof of humanity dao currently holds  eth on its kleros governor contract   dai currently held on a multisig setup to receive gitcoin grants in order to support the burning of ubi with the vaults implemented with the yearn finance community we propose that rather than simply having the dao holding these assets these get deposited to the ubiweth and the ubidai vaults that have been operational during the last two monthsthe dao will then hold ubiweth and ubidai tokens setting a clear example on how to support with its treasury the burning of ubi this action can then be used as an example to invite other daos to do just the same thing in order to support universal basic income on ethereum hired workers from the dao in the future can also be directly paid with either ubiweth or ubidai tokens and decide to withdraw themselves those funds any time they want to  implementationthe vaults can be currently accessed by end users on  and are both currently at  capacity  the ubiweth vault can be found on  the ubidai vault can be found on eth will have to be converted to weth first via a uniswap or some other dex swap and once the weth is available it gets deposited to the ubiweth vaultdai will have to transferred to the dao governor first and once there it can be deposited on its corresponding ubidai vault  governor setup a swap of eth for weth on uniswap an approval for the ubiweth vault to use the weth a transfer of the available weth into the ubiweth vault an approval for the ubidai vault to use the dai a transfer of the available dai into the ubidai vault additional notesits critical for the future of ubi to builid liquidity on these vaults so we can have a burning mechanisms that works at scale right now the vaults are capped at  million dai and  eth respectively each of them is currently at  capacity by setting a clear example coming from the proof of humanity dao we can then promote this action across the entire ethereum ecosystem and invite other daos to support ubi this way

protocol creating new dao specifically monetary policy technical innovations required universal basic income smart contract ubi abstractas proof humanity evolves protocol maintain person vote governance model using liquid democracy influence proof humanity protocol longer influence changes ubi token ubi token moving forward specific dao holders ubi able vote stake thus make decisions term accumulation investors holders governance staking proven effective influence long term holding across multiple defi projects legitimacy perspective makes sense skin game get advance interests ubi long term shall ultimately benefit every proof humanity member specification ubi shall snapshot page holders ubi verified proof humanity accounts able vote holdings ubi kleros governor shall setup enforce onchain offchain votes expressed ubi dao shall implement quadratic voting scheme holders able vote stake whales mitigated excessively influencing outcome votes since votes computed using following formula voting power sqrtbalance treasury proof humanity dao originally consisted million ubi sent ubi dao million ubi impact eth assets currently custody proof humanity dao implementation author: 0x2A52309eDF998799C4A8b89324CCAd91848c8676
clean_body2: hip  creation of the ubi daoauthor santisiri rustythegamer clesaege fraserdscottstatus phase   with nonelanguages en simple summarythis hip will split the governance of the ubi smart contract from the governance of the proof of humanity protocol by creating a new dao specifically for the monetary policy and technical innovations required for the universal basic income  smart contract ubi  abstractas proof of humanity evolves the protocol itself will maintain its  person  vote governance model using liquid democracy but it will only have influence over the proof of humanity protocol itself and no longer influence changes over the ubi token the ubi token will have moving forward a specific dao of its own where holders of ubi will be able to vote with their stake and thus make decisions that will have influence over the  motivationin order to increase the demandside pressure improving the utility of the ubi token by making it useful for governance decisions that influence its own smart contract shall have a positive impact in price over the long term and incentivize long term accumulation from investors and holders governance staking has proven to be an effective influence for long term holding across multiple defi projects and from a legitimacy perspective it makes sense that those with skin in the game get to advance the interests of ubi token holdersalso taking into consideration that ubi gets airdropped evenly to every verified human on proof of humanity we dont consider this puts at risk the democratic ideals that we pursue as a community on the contrary this is aimed at increasing the value of ubi over the long term which shall ultimately benefit every proof of humanity member specification  the  ubi shall have a snapshot page of its own where holders of ubi that are verified proof of humanity accounts will be able to vote with their holdings of ubi   a kleros governor shall be setup to enforce onchain the offchain votes expressed on the ubi  the dao shall implement a quadratic voting scheme where holders will be able to vote with their stake but whales will be mitigated from excessively influencing the outcome of votes since the votes will be computed using the following formula voting power  sqrtbalance   from the treasury of the proof of humanity dao that originally consisted of  million ubi  will be sent to the ubi dao  million ubi this will not have impact over the eth or any other assets currently under the custody of the proof of humanity dao implementation the  smart contract will be used to create the ubivote token as a proxy for the snapshot page of ubi since it follows the voting formula specified above a snapshot page for ubi dao will be created using the ubivote token a kleros governor will be created to enforce on chain decisions made on the ubi dao â€” the ubi governor the ubi token smart contract proxy will be managed by the new ubi governor created for the ubi dao  million ubi from the  will be transfered to the ubi governor   additional noteslarge holders of ubi that are not verified as proof of humanity members wont be able to participate in the dao this means that in order to engage with the dao ubi holdings must be used directly from a verified proof of humanity address this will help understand the distribution of ubi across multiple accounts and measure the gini coefficient of the community over the long term  we are united ðŸ’ªlast but not least this is by no means a split of the proof of humanity  ubi projects they both share the same community and must remain connected through the user interfaces that connect their smart contracts together so current and future users will begin accruing ubi once they finalize their profile

body: hip reduce number kleros jurors drawn first rounds poh cases oneauthor william georgestatus summarythis proposal would adjust parameter controls many kleros jurors drawn first round disputes concerning proof humanity registrationsremovalsabstracti propose reduce registration deposit specifying initial round dispute case profile registration removal request challenge draws one juror instead threespecificationthis would done updating following proof humanity parameteruse changearbitrator specifically changing arbitratorextradata initial round dispute draws jurormotivationthe goal reduce value required deposits degree securely possible currently first round kleros disputes proof humanity cases three jurors drawn rule case number jurors initially selected ensure greater stability rulings lower number appeals registry infancy deposit new submitters list make needs include enough eth submission ultimately challenged rejected arbitration fees paid jurors taken deposit hence one starts initial panels single juror judge proof humanity cases reduces size required deposits submit listrecall kleros schelling point based system jurors incentivized based whether coherent final juror vote hence even starting one juror incentive single juror vote seriously potential appeal people think juror voted incorrectly likely appeal first round juror would rewarded penalized based appeal jurors decide far kleros used first round panels single juror linguo negatives borderline cases might appealed added level variability terms whether first round juror represents larger panel would voted minority cases appeal wind back three juror panel anyway additional delay extra gas gone one juror round
author: 0x3099413ed2f687cDa893762fA7C17eA60d385e05
clean_title2: reduce number of kleros jurors drawn in first rounds of poh cases to one
clean_body2: hip  reduce number of kleros jurors drawn in first rounds of poh cases to oneauthor william georgestatus   summarythis proposal would adjust the parameter that controls how many kleros jurors are drawn in the first round of disputes concerning proof of humanity registrationsremovalsabstracti propose to reduce the registration deposit by specifying that the initial round of a dispute in case of profile registration or removal request challenge only draws one juror instead of threespecificationthis would be done by updating the following proof of humanity parameteruse changearbitrator specifically changing the arbitratorextradata so that the initial round of a dispute only draws  jurormotivationthe goal here is to reduce the value required for deposits to the degree that this is securely possible currently in the first round of kleros disputes for proof of humanity cases three jurors are drawn to rule on the case this number of jurors was initially selected to ensure greater stability in rulings and a lower number of appeals while the registry was in its infancy the deposit that new submitters to the list have to make needs to include enough eth so that if the submission is ultimately challenged and rejected the arbitration fees paid to those jurors can be taken from that deposit hence if one starts with initial panels of only a single juror to judge proof of humanity cases this reduces the size of required deposits to submit to the listrecall that kleros is a schelling point based system and jurors are incentivized based on whether they are coherent with the final juror vote hence even when starting with only one juror there is an incentive for that single juror to vote seriously because there is a potential for appeal so if people think the juror voted incorrectly there is likely to be an appeal and the first round juror would be rewarded or penalized based on what the appeal jurors decide so far kleros has used first round panels of only a single juror for linguo the negatives are that some borderline cases might not be appealed so there is an added level of variability in terms of whether the first round juror represents how a larger panel would have voted and that in the minority of cases where there is an appeal and you wind up back with a three juror panel anyway there is an additional delay and some extra gas to have gone through the one juror round

snapshot page  implementationthe  smart contract will be used as a proxy for the snapshot page of ubi since it follows the voting formula specified above additional noteslarge holders of ubi that are not verified as proof of humanity members wont be able to participate in the dao this means that in order to engage with the dao ubi holdings must be used directly from a verified proof of humanity address this will help understand the distribution of ubi across multiple accounts and measure the gini coefficient of the community over the long term last but not least this is by no means a split of the proof of humanity  ubi projects they both share the same community and must remain connected through the user interfaces that connect their smart contracts together so current and future users accrue ubi once they finalize their profile

title: [Signalling][Phase-2] HIP-17: Reduce Number of Kleros Jurors Drawn in First Rounds of POH Cases to One
body: hip reduce number kleros jurors drawn first rounds poh cases oneauthor william georgestatus summarythis proposal would adjust parameter controls many kleros jurors drawn first round disputes concerning proof humanity registrationsremovalsabstracti propose reduce registration deposit specifying initial round dispute case profile registration removal request challenge draws one juror instead threethis would done updating following proof humanity parameteruse changearbitrator specifically changing arbitratorextradata initial round dispute draws jurormotivationthe goal reduce value required deposits degree securely possible currently first round kleros disputes proof humanity cases three jurors drawn rule case number jurors initially selected ensure greater stability rulings lower number appeals registry infancy deposit new submitters list make needs include enough eth submission ultimately challenged rejected arbitration fees paid jurors taken deposit hence one starts initial panels single juror judge proof humanity cases reduces size required deposits submit listrecall kleros schelling point based system jurors incentivized based whether coherent final juror vote hence even starting one juror incentive single juror vote seriously potential appeal people think juror voted incorrectly likely appeal first round juror would rewarded penalized based appeal jurors decide far kleros used first round panels single juror linguo negatives borderline cases might appealed added level variability terms whether first round juror represents larger panel would voted minority cases appeal wind back three juror panel anyway additional delay extra gas gone one juror round
author: 0x3099413ed2f687cDa893762fA7C17eA60d385e05
clean_title2: reduce number of kleros jurors drawn in first rounds of poh cases to one
clean_body2: hip  reduce number of kleros jurors drawn in first rounds of poh cases to oneauthor william georgestatus   summarythis proposal would adjust the parameter that controls how many kleros jurors are drawn in the first round of disputes concerning proof of humanity registrationsremovalsabstracti propose to reduce the registration deposit by specifying that the initial round of a dispute in case of profile registration or removal request challenge only draws one juror instead of threethis would be done by updating the following proof of humanity parameteruse changearbitrator specifically changing the arbitratorextradata so that the initial round of a dispute only draws  jurormotivationthe goal here is to reduce the value required for deposits to the degree that this is securely possible currently in the first round of kleros disputes for proof of humanity cases three jurors are drawn to rule on the case this number of jurors was initially selected to ensure greater stability in rulings and a lower number of appeals while the registry was in its infancy the deposit that new submitters to the list have to make needs to include enough eth so that if the submission is ultimately challenged and rejected the arbitration fees paid to those jurors can be taken from that deposit hence if one starts with initial panels of only a single juror to judge proof of humanity cases this reduces the size of required deposits to submit to the listrecall that kleros is a schelling point based system and jurors are incentivized based on whether they are coherent with the final juror vote hence even when starting with only one juror there is an incentive for that single juror to vote seriously because there is a potential for appeal so if people think the juror voted incorrectly there is likely to be an appeal and the first round juror would be rewarded or penalized based on what the appeal jurors decide so far kleros has used first round panels of only a single juror for linguo the negatives are that some borderline cases might not be appealed so there is an added level of variability in terms of whether the first round juror represents how a larger panel would have voted and that in the minority of cases where there is an appeal and you wind up back with a three juror panel anyway there is an additional delay and some extra gas to have gone through the one juror round

title: [Binding][Phase-3] HIP-21: Amend the rules of the "Mission Board"
body: hip amend rules mission board author madsstatus proposal amend mission board instituted clarifying scope power adding rules dispute resolution member tiebreaking vote also added case board cannot come unanimous consent abstractthe mission board needs function also case decisions disputed therefore need simple rules happens consensus proposal clarifies happens case dispute clarifies limit power board adds two tiebreaking mechanisms board member tiebreaking votemotivationa board member contacted concerns functioning board made board sound much like management powers could interpreted broadly addition assumed board would function completely without disputes bit naive proposal seeks address issues adding mechanisms dispute resolution biggest mechanism adding board member election immediately making board uneven number specificationamend following paragraphspower scope board management cannot direct actions unless relates decision dao proposal correctly passed according board however broad power interpret rules dao including filling details specified proposal proposal calling election deciding hold quadratic voting election preannounced candidatesdispute resolution board member judge whether proposal action follows rules dao acting way board member must clearly state instead stating opinion normal poh member member ask another board member weigh judgment board members disagree judgment need majority vote among board members make final decision tiebreaking vote held board member whose seat election latest date tiebreaker added case seat unoccupied member abstains votingelection rules board member step leaving seat unoccupied unoccupied seats immediately election seat maximally occupied years new election board seat required interim board members still limited year pr member unoccupied seat opened boardrationalethis proposal attempts contradict nothing neither spirit letter chosen complete revision keep governance consistent
author: 0x77E851A926297fff2E6BC8FDbB5bB6087a617eC5
clean_title2: amend the rules of the mission board
clean_body2: hip  amend the rules of the â€œmission boardâ€author madsstatus    proposal is to amend the mission board instituted by  by clarifying the scope of power and adding rules for dispute resolution a  member and a tiebreaking vote are also added for the case when the board cannot come to unanimous consent abstractthe mission board needs to function also in the case when decisions are disputed therefore we need some simple rules for what happens when there is no consensus this proposal clarifies what happens in case of dispute clarifies the limit to the power of the board and adds two tiebreaking mechanisms  a  board member and a tiebreaking votemotivationa board member contacted me about concerns about the functioning of the board  made the board sound too much like management and the powers could be interpreted too broadly in addition it assumed that the board would function completely without disputes which was a bit naive so this proposal seeks to address these issues by adding mechanisms for dispute resolution the biggest mechanism is adding a  board member for election immediately making the board an uneven number  specificationamend  with the following paragraphspower scope the board is not management cannot direct any actions unless it relates to a decision by the dao such as if a proposal is correctly passed according to  the board has however broad power to interpret the rules of the dao including filling in details not specified in a proposal such as a proposal calling for an election and deciding to hold a quadratic voting election with preannounced candidatesdispute resolution a board member can judge whether a proposal or action follows the rules of the dao when acting in this way the board member must clearly state it instead of just stating an opinion as a normal poh member any member can ask another board member to weigh in on a judgment if the board members disagree on the judgment they will need a majority vote among the board members to make a final decision a tiebreaking vote will be held by the board member whose seat will be up for election at the latest date tiebreaker is added for the case when a seat is unoccupied or a member abstains from votingelection rules a board member can step down leaving their seat unoccupied unoccupied seats are immediately up for election a seat can maximally be occupied for  years before a new election for that board seat is required the interim board members are still limited to  year as pr   member an unoccupied  seat is opened on the boardrationalethis proposal attempts to contradict nothing in  neither the spirit nor the letter this was chosen over a complete revision to keep the governance more consistent

title: [Signalling] HIP-20: Add Proof Of Humanity login mode to cryptoauth.io
body: hip add proof humanity login mode cryptoauth author greg xunkulapchvatalstatus phase simple summaryimplement dedicated ui simple configuration option login proof humanity cryptoauth abstractcurrently want allow people login discourse wordpress etc using ethereum wallet limit people poh use builtin cryptoauth token restrictions mechanism works far idealthe user exposed details like proxy contract address necessary looses feeling integrity clicks login proof humanity button nothing login screens indicates still poh login processon integration side integrator required ask greg set token restrictions given integrations instead able set configuration processdedicated mode improve enduser experience allow much easier integration proof humanity login new web applications motivationi want provide simple way people able add login proof humanity websites believe beneficial cryptoauth project much easier use proof humanity project much easier communities adopt forums websites specificationthe work proposal split two categories configuration backend dedicated ui selfregistration portal would enhance integration experience scope proposal configuration backendin order make integration simple possible decided providing scope based configuration option would best approachduring configuration discourse software use cryptoauth would pass proofofhumanity scope parameter would force cryptoauth switch default mode login proof humanity modethe work mostly backend services need interpret configuration pass ui dedicated uiui changes mostly described designsadditionally wallet select screen would also need change address select screen would need indicate addresses verified pohwallets provide multiple addresses login user see clear information addresses wallet valid poh login rationaleadding poh login option cryptoauth looks like easiest fastest way enable simple login proof humanity interested communities login proof humanity separate productthere option create separate product would deliver functionality separate domain deploy independently cryptoauth either maintained external teamthis rejected requiring work initial releasethis option would still available even poh login added cryptoauth main codebase solutions share much required work maintenance supporti able provide support users via crisp integration cryptoauth maintain system part normal cryptoauth operations require dedicated contact person pass issues related poh cost developmentcost usd monthone developerthis includes development testing operations costs development producing materials like configuration guides etc technical supportcost usd monthsthe initial period months deployment would provide technical support users provide fixes found bugs period support login proof humanity would included normal cryptoauth operations total costthe total cost amounts usd links
author: 0x6Be450972b30891B16c8588DcBc10c8c2aEf04da
clean_title2: add proof of humanity login mode to cryptoauthio
clean_body2: hip  add proof of humanity login mode to cryptoauth author greg xunkulapchvatalstatus phase   simple summaryimplement dedicated ui and simple configuration option for â€œlogin with proof of humanityâ€ in cryptoauth abstractcurrently when you want to allow people to login to your discourse wordpress etc using their ethereum wallet and limit it to only people with poh you can use builtin cryptoauth token restrictions mechanism this works but itâ€™s far from idealthe user is exposed to more details like proxy contract address than necessary and looses the feeling of integrity he clicks â€œlogin with proof of humanityâ€ button but nothing on login screens indicates that he is still in this poh login processon the integration side an integrator is required to ask me greg to set token restrictions for given integrations instead of being able to set them on their own during configuration processdedicated mode will improve enduser experience and allow for much easier integration of proof of humanity login to new web applications motivationi want to provide simple way for people to be able to add â€œlogin with proof of humanityâ€ to their websites i believe this will be beneficial both for cryptoauth project it will be much easier to use it and to proof of humanity project it will be much easier for communities to adopt it in their forums and other websites specificationthe work in this proposal can be split into two categories configuration backend and dedicated ui selfregistration portal that would further enhance the integration experience is out of scope for this proposal configuration backendin order to make the integration as simple as possible i decided that providing â€œscopeâ€ based configuration option would be the best approachduring the configuration of discourse or other software to use cryptoauth you would pass proofofhumanity in scope parameter and this would force cryptoauth to switch from default mode to â€œlogin with proof of humanityâ€ modethe work here is mostly on the backend services that need to interpret this configuration and pass it to ui dedicated uiui changes are mostly described in designsadditionally the wallet select screen would also need to change and address select screen would need to indicate which addresses are verified with pohwallets can provide multiple addresses for login and user should see clear information which of the addresses from his wallet are valid for poh login rationaleadding poh login option to cryptoauth looks like the easiest and the fastest way to enable simple â€œlogin with proof of humanityâ€ for all interested communities login with proof of humanity as separate productthere is an option to create separate product that would deliver the same functionality separate domain and to deploy it independently from cryptoauth either maintained by me or by external teamthis was rejected as requiring more work for initial releasethis option would still be available even after poh login will be added to cryptoauth main codebase as both solutions share much of the required work maintenance  supportiâ€™m able to provide support for users via crisp integration in cryptoauth and maintain the system as part of normal cryptoauth operations but i will require dedicated contact person to pass them issues related to poh itself cost developmentcost  usd  monthone developerthis includes development testing operations costs during development and producing materials like configuration guides etc technical supportcost  usd  for  monthsthe initial period of  months after the deployment is when i would provide technical support for users and provide fixes for any found bugs after this period the support for â€œlogin with proof of humanityâ€ would be included in normal cryptoauth operations total costthe total cost amounts to  usd links

title: [Binding] HIP-16 HIP-16: Make admin roles of communication platforms eligible
body: english version simple summarythis hip institutes mechanism determine position admin social communication tools voluntarily want recognized official dao either social media twitter reddit communication channels telegram groups abstractin order decentralize positions enforcement within dao need create mechanisms channels communication get seal community managed ie poh subreddit community managed motivationfollowing spirit creates framework management dao without altering smart contract propose better mechanism establishing enforcing roles recognized channels communication specification administrative role administrator admin position person channel communication social media accounts forums instant messaging groups position person privileges enforce policies convened rules channels include muting removal admitting participation members group along administrative tasks although free responsibility person holding admin role moderate dialogue content creation role commonly known community manager moderator facilitator etc admin may assigned role moderator authority responsible product manager mission board moderators assignment mechanisms outside communitymanaged channel volunteer status channels scope hip agreement channel ownercreator associated poh accompanied badge seal piece text clearly recognizes scoperoles admin positions communitymanaged channels communication would temporary roles elected community include nonexhaustive list discourse forum twitter facebook groups reddit discord whatsapp instagram telegram groups users channels elections made separately elections done tokenlog platform new repositories created github solely purpose administrator election elections elections made using quadratic voting negative votes human receive voting ideally elected admin every users channel since position voluntary might less elected admin per top candidates positive score take positions eg channel members top candidates positive score become official time one official administrators lose position tokenlogs ranking next candidate come rank gain official role admin roles registered individuals proof roles revocable security reasons serious offenses community mission board call emergency voting snapshot admins revoked way cannot reapply role next admin roles moderator roles therefore require suppress opinions debates long follow code conduct established channel mere opposition admin opinion grounds admin ban person administrators obligationsadministrators acknowledge access communication channels profiles labelled admin gives additional power comes additional responsibilities expected behave ambassadors project addition following appropriate codes conduct refrain expressing virulent opinions proof humanity related projects admin accounts subject higher standards terms good conduct ex avoiding excessive profanity engaging debates topics outside proof humanity politics religionthis preclude formalizing criticism proof humanity however done either technical dispassionate manner preferably offering constructive solutions ii using nonadmin account communitymanaged status owner channel communication within scope hip contact mission board apply communitymanaged call volunteers offered channel members participate election process finished elected members occupying roles channel receives community managed badge link channel provided proof humanity project site referenced throughout rest channels failure comply aspect hip would trigger removal channel community managed list special first conditionfor significance spearhead value community managed status following channels enter admin selection process effective immediately telegram group proof humanity telegram group proof humanity en espaÃ±ol telegram group proof humanity chinese telegram group proof humanity portuguese subreddit proof humanity rationalecurrently admin positions communication channels grown thousands users subject initiative person first created channel telegram reddit roles right virtually permanent without rules govern time position roles assigned creates space centralization possibility indefinite perpetuation position among issues arise permanence role silencing opposition pushing specific agenda creating hostile environment etc object important role considered election lead voting fatigue enough reasons believe proposal lead sort problems version en espaÃ±oldisponible en este link

author: 0x504E7620069a0a8354434dED3150ed7E2ECF5153
clean_title2: make admin roles of communication platforms eligible
clean_body2: english version simple summarythis hip institutes a mechanism to determine the position of admin in the social communication tools that voluntarily want to be recognized as official by the dao either social media twitter reddit or communication channels telegram groups abstractin order to further decentralize positions of enforcement within the dao there is the need to create mechanisms in which channels of communication get the seal of â€œcommunity managed â€ ie â€œpoh subreddit community managedâ€ motivationfollowing the spirit of  which creates a framework for management of the dao without altering the smart contract i propose a better mechanism for establishing enforcing roles on all recognized channels of communication specification   administrative role administrator or admin the position that a person has over a channel of communication it being social media accounts forums instant messaging groups in this position the person has privileges to enforce policies of the convened rules of these channels and include muting removal or admitting the participation of the members of the group along with other administrative tasks although they are free to do so it is not the responsibility of the person holding the admin role to moderate dialogue or content creation which is a role more commonly known as community manager moderator facilitator etc an admin may be assigned the role of moderator by the authority responsible for that product manager mission board but moderators assignment and mechanisms are outside of this  communitymanaged channel a volunteer status for any of the channels in the scope of this hip in which there is an agreement of the channel ownercreator to be associated with poh it is accompanied by a badge or a seal or any piece of text that clearly recognizes them as such  scoperoles for admin positions for each of the communitymanaged channels of communication would be temporary roles and elected from the community these include nonexhaustive list discourse forum twitter facebook groups reddit discord whatsapp instagram telegram groups users and channels  elections are made separately by  elections should be done in the tokenlog platform  new repositories will be created on github solely for the purpose of the administrator election on each of the  elections are  elections are made using quadratic voting negative votes are  each human will receive  voting  ideally there should be  elected admin for every  users in a channel since the position is voluntary there might be less than  elected admin per   the top candidates with a positive score will take their positions eg on a channel with  members the top  candidates with a positive score will become the official  each time one of the official administrators lose their position on tokenlogs ranking the next candidate to come up in the rank will gain the official role as  admin roles should be registered individuals in proof of  roles are only revocable for security reasons or serious offenses to the community the mission board can call an emergency voting of  in snapshot admins revoked in this way cannot reapply for the role in the next  admin roles are not moderator roles therefore do not require to suppress their opinions in debates as long as they follow the code of conduct established for that channel mere opposition to that adminâ€™s opinion should not be grounds for the admin to ban that person administrators obligationsadministrators acknowledge that access to communication channels or profiles labelled as â€œadminâ€ gives them an additional power which comes with additional responsibilities they are expected to behave as ambassadors of the project in addition to following the appropriate codes of conduct they should refrain from expressing virulent opinions about proof of humanity or related projects with their admin accounts they are subject to higher standards in terms of good conduct ex avoiding excessive profanity or engaging in debates on topics outside of proof of humanity such as politics or religionthis doesnâ€™t preclude them from formalizing criticism on proof of humanity however it should be done either in i a technical and dispassionate manner and preferably offering constructive solutions or ii using a nonadmin account â€œcommunitymanagedâ€ status  the owner of any channel of communication within the scope of this hip can contact the mission board and apply for the â€œcommunitymanagedâ€  a call for volunteers is offered in the channel and those members participate in the election  once that process is finished and the elected members are occupying their roles that channel receives the â€œcommunity managedâ€ badge and a link to that channel will be provided in proof of humanity project site and referenced throughout the rest of the channels  failure to comply with any aspect of this hip would trigger the removal of that channel from the â€œcommunity managed listâ€ special first conditionfor their significance and to spearhead the value of having the â€œcommunity managedâ€ status the following channels should enter the admin selection process effective immediately telegram group proof of humanity  telegram group proof of humanity en espaÃ±ol  telegram group proof of humanity chinese  telegram group proof of humanity portuguese  subreddit proof of humanity  rationalecurrently the admin positions in communication channels that have grown to the thousands of users were subject to the initiative of the person that first created the channel telegram reddit these roles right now are virtually permanent without rules that govern their time in that position or how or why their roles were assigned this creates space for centralization and the possibility of indefinite perpetuation in the position among other issues that arise from this permanence in their role silencing opposition pushing a specific agenda creating a hostile environment etc some object that this is not an important role to be considered for election or that this will lead to voting fatigue there are enough reasons to believe that this proposal will not lead to this sort of problems version en espaÃ±oldisponible en este link

author: 0xc6F41651921f38A3343d9016Dd1da5d5c18b1867
clean_title2: code of conduct for poh telegram channels
clean_body2: introductioniâ€™ve been observing that conversations on the proof of humanity telegram channels are sometimes taken over by groups using toxic memes and super heavy language like â€œpoorfagâ€ and â€œretardâ€not only this makes many me included feel alienated from these spaces but it is detrimental to our ability to have productive debates and collaborate as a communityhereâ€™s a minimal code of conduct which i think could be helpful for us to have on the proof of humanity telegram channels this final version is the result of integrating all of the comments and critiques made by the community in this thread thank you all for your contributions   nuwanda it also adapted sections from the citizen code of conduct and the radicalxchange community code of conduct here it is proof of humanity is committed to the principle of openness and facilitating a free exchange of ideas in an environment of thoughtful discourse proof of humanity is committed to providing a friendly safe and welcoming environment for all regardless of gender sexual orientation disability ethnicity religion or similar personal characteristic the following behaviors will lead you to being banned from the channelthreats of violence or violent languagesexually explicit material or languagesexist racist homophobic transphobic ableist or otherwise discriminatory jokes and languagepersonal insultsspamming trolling baiting or other attentionstealing behavior is not welcomeimpersonating another person by copying their avatar posting content under their email address intentionally using a deceptively similar username or otherwise posing as someone elsedoxxing and invasion of privacy posting other peopleâ€™s personal information such as phone numbers private email addresses physical addresses credit card numbers social securitynational identity numbers or passwords depending on the context such as in the case of intimidation or harassment other information such as photos or videos that were taken or distributed without the subjectâ€™s consent may be considered to be an invasion of privacy especially when such material presents a safety risk to the subjectchannel admins will be responsible for enforcing this code of conduct according to these rules if they consider a transgression to be less severe they may choose to give an initial warning instead of a ban if a user has already received a  hour ban and disrespects the code of conduct once again they shall be permanently bannedforum post
